name: Medieval Alchemist
summary: Medieval Alchemist is an alchemist survival game set in the medieval period. Survive against the challenges of nature, collect ingredients, produce potions, sell non-essential ingredients in the market, develop your character and build your living space by hiring workers.

name: Metal Clash
summary: A robot fighting game from Data East.

name: Mercenaries of Astonia
summary: A massively multiplayer online role playing game. Each player begins their journey as a battle-hardened Templar, a magic-wielding Harakim, or a dabbler of both, a Mercenary. The experience gained as characters solve quests, discover new places, and kill evil monsters, can be applied to raise any of a large number of attributes, skills and spells. Characters gain rank and power, qualifying them for better and more powerful equipment for the new and greater challenges that lie ahead.

name: Metal Storm: Collector's Edition
summary:
An official patched re-release of Irem's cult classic platforming shooter Metal Storm sold by Retro-Bit.

In this enhanced edition, they integrated elements that had been cut off from the original Famicom release to be enjoyed on original hardware worldwide.

This re-release included additional collector goodies such as a statuette, a poster, a novelty box, and an enamel pin.

name: Merchant: Frozen Tome
summary: Unlock the Frozen Tome and enter into the Frentir Chasm!

name: MechCube: Escape
summary: MechCube is not only a set of extraordinary puzzles and tricky riddles. This is a non-linear game in point-and-click adventure genre with a lot of endings, secrets, easter eggs and references to modern pop culture.

name: Metal Masters
summary: The Game Boy port of Metal Masters.

name: Mekkablood: Quarry Assault
summary: The Year is 2082. You play the role of Bill, a grizzled, and extremely hairy robojockey. It's up to you to take the reigns of Bill's Mekk, with your friend Rusty, to get your revenge against TorxCorp, who's trying to steal your mining claim.

name: Mega Zombie Explosion
summary: Mega Zombie Explosion is Zombie killing game where you need to survive the Zombie Waves there is lot of Zombies to kill and you need talent to do it. But there is a help many different weapons to kill the zombies and Cool Background Rock Music.

name: Meowth's Party
summary: A cancelled Pokémon game for the Nintendo GameCube to show the capabilities.

name: Meet me at Noon
summary: Meet me at NooN is a cozy puzzle game with brain-scratching time-loop mechanics. Control two spirits that create time loops each day, learn their different behaviors, how they can interact with each other and how these interactions are interfering with their time loops.

name: Mexe mexe tupi
summary: Released as built-in game in some Tec Toy Master System consoles.

name: Merchant Simulator
summary: Buy, sell and barter your way to the top! Hire new employees to help you run your shop and choose wisely with your trades. Will you aid your king and community or wring them dry?

name: Metroid: Another Legend
summary: A romhack for Metroid: Zero Mission around 4 hours long

name: Meridian 157: Chapter 2
summary: Trapped deep underground on a lost and forgotten island, David’s priority shifts from finding answers about the mystery surrounding him, to surviving the crisis he now finds himself trapped in. It’s now up to you to find an escape from the 157th meridian, but be warned, as escape may not be so easy

name: Merge Flower
summary:
Merge Flowers is a strategy game, in which we will have to defend our garden from the attacks of the walking dead. This is why we will unite all the flowers that are growing with the intention of sending more and more intense attacks.

In Merge Flowers we will have to use our best strategy in order to unite the same flowers, at the most appropriate time, to find other powerful species. Only in this way will we be able to send many automatic attacks to each of the zombies that approach our surroundings. In fact, at the top of each enemy we will see a status bar with which we will identify their vital state.

At the bottom we will find a golden button through which we can invest the coins that we are going to obtain many. This is how we will increase the rate of attacks and therefore it will be easier for us to kill each zombie and the respective level bosses. However, we will also have a store from which to acquire new characters and functions that make us more powerful.

Merge Flowers is one of those titles in which we won't be able to take our eyes off the screen of our smartphone. The continuous hordes of zombies will encourage us to produce flowers tirelessly and thereby protect our garden from these unpleasant beings.

name: Metal Stoker
summary:
A cyberpunk multi-directional shoot 'em up for the PC Engine.

Metal Stoker is a top-down, multi-directional shoot 'em up for the PC Engine, developed and published by Face (possibly through their subsidiary brand Sankindo). The game features the subtitle "Neo Hardboiled Shooting".

The goal of the game is to explore each stage, fight a boss and move onto the next. Some stages are comprised of several linear enclosed areas that require that the player clear the room of enemies before they can proceed, while others are more open and let the player scroll in multiple directions while seeking out their foes. The story is sparse, and concerns the player's testing out of a new Custom CS-05 tank through a series of simulations.

The game was released exclusively for the PC Engine. It has yet to be rereleased in any capacity.

name: Mewn
summary: Mewn is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The game uses an item-collection system like that of Yume Nikki, but the game's effect equivalent, Components, are unusable. To compensate, the player is given various tools to aid the collections of these items. The goal of the game is to collect all Components. The protagonist is *. *, a spaceman from the moon who has crashed on Earth. Their spaceship is beyond repair, requiring them to find replacement parts throughout the planet.

name: Medieval Thief VR
summary: "Medieval Thief", a thrilling single-player virtual reality game that takes you on a role-playing adventure set in a medieval world of darkness and secrecy. As a cunning thief, you will be equiped swords, bows and arrows to fend off soldiers trying to protect Medieval treasures

name: Mega-Bug
summary: Crawling stealthily through the corridors of the maze, the bugs are after you-their one mission in life is to search you out and make you their dinner, before you find your way completely through the giant maze. Their powers of detection are uncanny ... the only way to outsmart them is by leaving as many conflicting clues as to your whereabouts as possible. You push on, through the twists and turns of the maze, hoping that what lies around the corner is more points, and not a Mega-Bug!

name: Metrocubevania
summary: A tiny metroidvania platformer where you play as a cube. You gain more and more abilities as you progress. There are multiple environments, some collectibles, and you can find a boss fight at the end.

name: Memories: My Story, My Choice
summary: Romantic Otome Game. Create your own lasting Memories and the choices are yours!

name: Metamorbob
summary: 3 unique capacities, 5 levels and 1 boss, Can you reach the end in this perma-death adventure?

name: Megaman Sprite Game
summary: An RPG game based on Megaman Sprite Comic

name: Mecha Tactics
summary: Build mechas, command your squad members to victory and conquest, seize the stars, settle randomized unknown star systems, defend your faction from hordes of assailants. Featuring: -Randomized enemy squads. -Randomized star systems. -Grid based Combat. -Local 2-Players versus mode.

name: Mega Zombie
summary:
Mega Zombie is a free-to-play third-person shooter game.
You do not only fight the enemy players. There are terrifying zombies.
The zombies will attack the players regardless of enemy and allies.
You have to fight zombies and enemies.

name: Meld
summary: Meld is a mind-bending puzzle game featuring 200+ levels and a build-in editor so you can create your own and play levels made by others!

name: Me and My Shadow
summary: A free libre puzzle/platform game in which you try to reach the exit by solving puzzles. Spikes, moving blocks, fragile blocks and much more stand between you and the exit. Record your moves and let your shadow mimic them to reach blocks you couldn’t reach alone.

name: Metroid: Origins
summary: Metroid Origins is a short fangame of Metroid developed in MEngine by Hackmi. If features 3 Areas, 2 boss variations, original music, brand new game mechanics, a refined engine made in Game Maker Studio, overdetailed environments and lots of custom artwork.

name: Metro Manager LA
summary: Metro Manager LA is a strategy simulation game about connecting communities throughout Los Angeles. Manage maintenance, security, wait time, and train capacity as you attempt to keep the riders of Los Angeles happy.

name: Melody of Seasons
summary: Create your new life in Melody Vale! What kind of farm will you make and what will your impact be on the local community? Uncover the mysteries of the vale! Meet the locals and discover their stories - maybe you'll even meet someone extra special!

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 1
summary: The renowned Mega Man Battle Network series is back! Vol. 1 contains Mega Man Battle Network 1-3, including both versions of Mega Man Battle Network 3 for a total of four titles, plus additional features like a gallery of illustrations and music! In addition, online play is supported!

name: Metal Fangs
summary: Metal Fangs is a game for the Sega Mega Drive by Victor. It was not released outside of Japan. It's an Arcade racing game with top-down perspective in which two teams of four circle a track with the goal of eliminating each other.

name: Melancholy Republic
summary: A story driven experience about an ambitious, newly elected senator Claire Lockridge. Follow Claire as she struggles to uncover her father's assassin and prevent a civil war in the heart of her country. A story of courage, love, defiance and tragedy; Claire will forever change the course of history.

name: Men in Black
summary: An old map that was initially made to look like the Bronx from New York but later retooled into Men in Black

name: Mercury no Aoi Suna
summary:
A sci-fi adventure RPG with overworld and dungeon parts combined.
Female protagonist. Has lover elements.

Data intelligence hacker Yuno one day meets a mysterious artificial intelligence. Enter into a world of secrets where the government's most highly classified secret files are kept...

name: Meowing Point
summary: Point and meow. 3D hidden cat game. These creatures have been turned into stone. Find and save them all.

name: Metamorphosis + What the Duck Bundle
summary: Strange is the new normal in this bundle! In Metamorphosis, you are Gregor, a man who wakes up and finds he has mysteriously been transformed into a bug. Navigate a world that has become hauntingly stretched and unfamiliar.

name: MesetaMiner: CodeName
summary: What's better than being a millionaire, a billionaire? That boring grind is played out, your goal in this game will not only be to make lots of money, but to create currency and become a Federal reserve system.

name: MeiQi: Season1
summary: The retro scene of 1990, immersed back to the past. Innovative logical reasoning gameplay combined with real 3D interaction. The horrible push puzzle game, all the clues are in front of you, but the mystery is unknown. True reasoning, you are the big detective of the 90s.

name: Melone in the Dark
summary: Know your fruit. Know its name.

name: Mega Tetris 2000
summary: Mega Tetris 2000 is another game released by Russian programmers for the Spectrum clones.

name: Mechaguard
summary: Mechaguard is an arena shooter where you have to create the perfect vehicle to destroy a huge horde of monsters.

name: Meta Apes
summary: Meta Apes is a free-to-play, play-and-earn MMO strategy game. It is set in a post-apocalyptic world, in which humanity has ended and a new era ruled by Apes has begun. Next on the agenda is space domination. Each pri-mate (yes, you) will have to work closely with their Gang to become the strongest Clan and win the ultimate race to space.

name: Merge Beasts: Defense Game
summary: The evil Beasts are attacking our temple, and we need your help! Merge the Beasts by dragging them on top of each other to build up your defenses. Fight off waves of evil Beasts and take down bosses to unlock new levels.

name: Metal Carnage
summary: Metal Carnage is a car-based online session shooter... With turrets!

name: Mermaid Colony
summary: Descend into the dark depths of the ocean and rebuild a mythical colony of mermaids which now lies in ruins. At the bottom of the sea an ancient horror slowly awakens...

name: Meow Tower: Nonogram
summary:
Welcome to Meow Tower! Build your very own tower for stray cats.

Solve Nonogram (a.k.a Picross) puzzles to buy furniture and decorate your cats' rooms. Expand the tower and meet more stray cats. If you become friends with the resident cats, they might tell you a secret story!

name: Medal Winners 24
summary: Win more medals than your opponents to rank at the top of the medal table in javelin throw, 100 metres, cycling, basketball shooting, pole vault, shot put, and other events across four different modes.

name: Memorize 2
summary: Rebirth of the popular web novel! Memorize Season 2 is a Fusion Fantasy visual novel.

name: Meduziak
summary: A silly underwater point-and-click adventure puzzle game.

name: Mechanic 8230: Escape From Ilgrot - Extended Edition
summary:
Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.
Even the tiniest coin can prove vital in this adventure. Remember – the only weapon at your disposal is your mind!

name: Memories Off Historia Volume 1
summary:
Memories Off: Historia - Volume 1 is compilation of the first four works in the Memories Off series:

- Memories Off
- Memories Off 2nd
- Omoide ni Kawaru Kimi: Memories Off
- Memories Off: Sorekara

This is the first release for Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4. All games have been enhanced with full HD graphics.

name: Mega Man Battle Network Chrono X
Mega Man X
summary: Unofficial homebrew port of Mega Man X for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive.

name: Mending Wall
summary: A game inspired by a poem, and intended for two players—but playable solo.

name: Mechanical Gods
summary: Mechanical Gods is a 3D Arena Fighting game. Choose your favourite fighter and test your skills against powerful AIs and players alike, hitting, slashing, dashing and kicking your way through every arena. Each fight you survive gets you closer to unveil the secrets of the Mechanical Gods.

name: MER Innebandy
summary: MER Innebandy is a game based on Floorball. It features the entire Svenska Elitserien – the national league of Sweden – with real teams and actual players as of the 1996 season.

name: Medal Bound
summary:
Build your own superstar team of athletes from the ground up and guide them to glory with this sports management game.
Scout athletes, find sponsors and customize their training routines to reach peak performance just in time for key events.
Want to raise your odds of finding your next gold medalist? Draft a superstar athlete or hire an assistant coach!
Put your skills to the test to see if you can create a team of world class athletes!
Start out with Track, Cycling and Aquatics.
Purchase additional sports packs including a pack for Martial Arts, Gymnastics and Field, and a pack for Marksmanship, Equestrian, and Watersports.

name: Memories in Late Summer
summary:
The summer is coming to an end, and the autumn steps are slowly approaching this slightly special season. 
 
Lost the memory of the summer youth - hope. 
 
What is the origin of the mystery? 
 
While looking for memories, it seems to be in a more dense affair. 
What is the outcome of waiting for such a two person?

name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain - Day One Edition
Meteor Mess
summary:
Meteor Mess 3D is a remake of the graphic adventure game, Maniac Mansion. It's a fan project and a homage to a game that has a special place in our lives.

This version contains new rooms, objects and puzzles and even a completely new way to solve the game.

name: Metaball: Kung Fu Pack
summary: 7 Legendary Items, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, 500 Metanium, and 30 Beam Shards! This is the Kung Fu package available at an affordable price! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss ou

name: Melody Quest
summary: Join our lovable protagonist on a magical adventure through vibrant landscapes, where music reigns supreme. As you journey through the fantastical realms, you'll encounter delightful creatures and charming companions, each with their own unique musical talents.

name: Memorial Series: Sunsoft vol. 1
summary: Memorial Series: Sunsoft Vol. 1 is a compilation featuring Ikki and Super Arabian.

name: Mercer Mayer's Little Critter and the Great Race
summary: Critterville is having a big soap box derby, and you and Little Critter have to find the parts to build your own racer. Once you've selected the model you want to build, you'll travel all around the town performing helpful tasks, trading items, and talking to townspeople in order to collect the car parts you need.

name: Metropolis
summary: Metropolis - The Ultimate City Simulator. In a game of construction, politics and real estate, build and manage your city to become the most liveable city in the world.

name: Mech Builder
summary: Welcome to Mech Builder- a relaxing puzzle game inspired by Model building(gunpla). You will experience the relaxing process of building a model kit with complete freedom with over 50+ puzzles.

name: Medieval Clicker Blacksmith
summary:
Welcome to the first Medieval Clicker adventure, a game where you’ll be able to craft the most epic fantasy weapons ever as a talented blacksmith!
Wield the Legendary Hammer and join Talkor the medieval blacksmith and her daughter Vala in this adventure forging the most rare materials and therefore, crafting amazing medieval weapons.

Click and tap! That will be the only way your blacksmith will be able to forge epic medieval weapons nonstop!

name: Medieval Wars
summary: Real-time strategy. Your lands have been attacked by a horde of evil orcs. They have surrounded the kingdom and are trying to take it away you have the power. But there are countless knights at your disposal who are ready to stand up for their native land.

name: Metroid: Scrolls 6
summary: Metroid: Scrolls 6 is a full, open-ended Metroid Zero Mission hack. The hack has full graphical changes and a full original soundtrack. You can play and explore 7 full areas and might also find things never used in a hack before.

name: Mermaid Shores
summary: A summer visit to your aunt’s home leads to a very memorable encounter with an unforgettable merboy. When the two of you reconnect many years later, you realize a little too late that handsome mermen aren’t the only secrets that lie within the ocean’s depths…

name: MetaCard: The Turing Test
summary: We have made changes in the differentiation of roles. Only one role has an armor, and the other roles have their unique defense means. And the roles will be very different. Unexpectedly, the energy of one role will not be restored every round. How does he fight?

name: Me Myself & Die
summary: Orchestrate your death to progress!

name: Merri Puzzle
summary: Merri Puzzle is a physics based puzzle solving game, with a unique look and feel to it. The goal is simple, getting an object, often a ball to the end of a maze.

name: Meme Machine
summary: Meme Machine is a color-matching puzzle action game. Pick your meme and use single- and multi-colored pieces to do battle to crush your opponent!

name: Metamorphos
summary: Take on the role of the temple’s guardian, awakened to cleanse the temple from an evil force corrupting it. Fight and dodge your way through a series of corrupted denizens, wildlife, and guardians to confront Nafaset, the Defiler, and restore the blessed oases.

name: Mega Man: The Rulers of Space
summary: A fan-made 16-bit SUPER remake of the GameBoy "Mega Man V" (aka Rockman World 5).

name: Mega Run: Redford's Adventure
summary: A sidescroller jump'n'run game.

name: MetälBörn
summary: Techno has taken over your neighborhood. Honor your metal god Kilmister, arm yourself up to the baffles, raise the volume and show these punks which is the music that makes the shells shake. The metalheads are not dead, but the technos will be…

name: Medieval Knightmare
summary: Hordes of monsters has invaded the village, the last opportunity to avoid them reach the king is you. Arm with weapons and fight the hordes solo or with a team.

name: Metro Quester: Osaka
summary:
METRO QUESTER | OSAKA is a dungeon exploration RPG based in a post-apocalyptic futuristic world created by the manga artist Kazushi Hagiwara, with a deep game system designed by Hironori Kato that offers the excitement and surprises reminiscent of 1980s computer games through hack and slash.

Moving the location to the city of water, Osaka, it features 32 characters and 8 classes, enjoyable combo skills, numerous customizable weapons, a bestiary, and features like NEW GAME+ for replayability, offering plenty of depth for dedicated gamers.

name: MeecheenMe
summary: A crazy online third person shooter. Create and import Custom Models & Custom Taunts for everyone to see!

name: Metro 2033: Wars
summary:
One of the most strategic and intense games on the App Store! Welcome to the Tunnels! Lights out!

“Metro 2033: Wars” is a turn-based, open-world, strategy game, based on the story of Dmitry Glukhovsky's best-selling novel series, “Metro 2033.”

It’s the year 2033 and the entirety of the world has been reduced to nuclear rubble. Humanity is nearing extinction and radiation is making even the most basic surface dwelling, uninhabitable. New life forms have arisen that are far better adapted to this new dark, damp and alien-like world. Bands of survivors live on without ever knowing the warmth of sunlight, and whether or not they are the last ones left on Earth. The Moscow Metro is the reluctant home for this new humanity and one you protect at all costs.

Metro Stations have become city-states run by new and emerging Factions, uniting its members around ideas, religions, water, or simply the need to survive. Your daily existence centers around gathering resources necessary for survival, repelling attacks of mutants, exploring and conquering new metro stations and developing armed mercenary units when the need arises. To survive, you'll have to build necessary facilities at Stations, establish diplomatic relations with your neighbors and uphold the economy of your little underground state.

name: Memory Stamps
summary: Memory Stamps is an elegant puzzle game that combines a few a proven methods to enhance visual memory and helps you relax. You will be first presented detail-rich, themed illustrations, then after you consider you've taken all in, several illustration elements will disappear and, using your visual memory you will reassemble the illustration. The game applies for both gamers and non-gamers, and acts as an excellent memory training activity; stress-free. Although levels can be completed at your own pace, there is a challenge mode available for the ones who want to test their memory to the limits, with a limited time to study the illustrations and with a limited number of errors to make.

name: Meteor Hunt Idle
summary: Join our crew, mine meteors, build a base, fight space pirates, and make your wallet as fat as the moon!

name: Metal Saga: The Ark of Wastes
summary: Metal Saga: The Ark of Wastes (メタルサーガ ～荒野の方舟～ Metaru Sāga ~ Kōya no Hakobune ~) is a role-playing video game, which was developed and published by Japanese company Success for Android and iOS. It is the tenth title of Metal Max series.

name: Melon
summary: Melon is an emotional role-playing puzzle adventure game about piecing together forgotten moments and memories.

name: Me & My Friend Pippa!
summary: Make your mark as an aspiring adventurer by embarking on a journey to save King Elesio's missing Pippa in this charming bite-sized RPG!

name: Mekabolt
summary: Use your trusty Mekabolt device to manipulate robots, solve a variety of puzzling levels and obtain batteries to fix the robots!

name: Meatball Dog
summary: meatball dog is about a dog eating meatballs.

name: Mechanism
summary: Mechanism — an adventure game about a lonely robot. Dive into a depressive steampunk world which has been infected with a strange disease called "Phlegm".

name: Meister2
summary: Craft and upgrade your gear to give your units a role. Units can continue to switch roles, depending on their equipment: Tanker, DPS, Healer, Worker, etc. Craft the most appropriate equipment to counteract the monsters who have gone crazy due to the unstable mana stream from destroying the village.

name: Metis One
summary: Metis One is an action-packed co-op top down shooter in the design style of the arcade classics. Take command of the A6-Gravitus to defend the people of Jupiter Colony, Metis One, against an unrelenting alien onslaught. With Drop-In Co-op, Player Two can join the action at anytime!

name: MegaCryptoPolis
summary: A decentralized city builder & strategy blockchain game where every asset and material produced in-game by players is an NFT. Build and manage a supply chain to produce simple and complex materials which can be sold to other players or swapped for $MEGA tokens. MegaCryptoPolis is the play to earn player-driven microeconomy layer of the upcoming decentralized Mega World metaverse

name: MetaMorphic Rippers
summary: A fast-paced arena Brawler that combines the Stylish Combat of a Hack and Slash Game With Transformations, Players can select each Class with unique attributes and abilities for you to master.

name: Meat and Metal
summary: You are the operator of a combat turret defending the border beyond which lies the last human city!

name: Memetown USA
summary: Memetown USA is a short game about saving the world from a dangerous church trying to destroy the universe. Memetown USA may be small in scope, but it makes up for it with intense AAA quality meme material.

name: Mega Man 11: Collector's Package
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Mega Man 11
- Starter Guidebook
- Poster
- Product code (while supplies last)
- amiibo (Nintendo Switch version only)

name: Meister
summary: Collects resources, makes products, get money, and repair a time machine.

name: Merge & Blade: Mineral mine
summary: Assemble the best units to mine minerals.

name: Metal Slug 1st & 2nd Mission Double Pack
summary: METAL SLUG 1ST MISSION released in 1999 for the NEOGEO POCKET COLOR, with its sequel METAL SLUG 2ND MISSION hitting shelves in 2000.

name: Mecho Wars
summary: Jump into an exciting war between the Winged Crusade and the Landians!

name: Medium-naut
summary:
This is an SF-horror/action game created by Takumi Naramura, creator of the hit 2D action series La-Mulana.
Naramura’s first foray into solo game development in years.

name: Medieval Revenge
summary: Playing a card game where you navigate from the revenge of an English peasant against marauding Vikings in medieval England to the attainment of kingdom power.

name: Me Red: The Ultimate Adventure
summary: A sidescroller jump'n'run game.

name: Medieval Times
summary:
First of all I want to thank you for taking the time to visit this page. And please, leave me your comments and suggestions and concerns. For me they are fundamental, so that together we can give shape to this project and improve it day by day.
Having said that, I tell you a little about this project that I have started to develop with a lot of love because it brings together my two great hobbies, 3D design and writing. This graphic novel, seeks to tell the story and adventures of Bennett and the inhabitants of the village of Nemerion and their relationships, and season them with a little sex. At the moment there are 12 characters in total, most of them appear in the first chapter and some in the following chapters. I don't want to tell you much, I would like you to discover it...
I wish to think that the novel has a balance, between History, dialogue and Sexual content, I know that it is something difficult to achieve, but I would like to be able to maintain this balance throughout the novel, and I hope that you with your comments, tell me what you think, as well as if it lacks or has more than one characteristic in particular. Although I already have a definite idea of where the novel will go and its stories, I would love to improve it together even more, 2 heads think more than 1 hahaha.
My plan at the moment is to be able to publish a chapter per month (if my current work allows it, since I mainly dedicate a little time every night, when I come back from work, and on weekends, as much as I can). Each month I will be improving aspects of the game, as well as developing in depth the personality and history of each character of the novel. Right now the bottleneck is given with the PC I work with, which does not allow me to render the images of the novel (it takes me an average time of 12 Hs each image, which makes it infeasible to do the work of rendering with my current PC), I can only do the layout of the images, thanks to the help of two Friends: Miguel and Gonzalo (thanks guys), who lent me their Pc's, remotely I do the work of rendering, and thus the whole project has begun to come to life. From now on my short term objective is to be able to change the PC in order to be able to make the rendering work faster and to be able to have a better quality in the images and videos of the novel.
As for the novel itself, I have the idea of being able to add in the lapse of the first 3 chapters:
● An inventory, which will allow Bennett's interactions with the other characters as well as with the environment itself to be expanded.
● A map of the village, and with it the possibility of moving freely through the village.
● A character card, which will collect and show all the attributes of Bennett (Sexual Orientation, exploits, memories. Etc)
● A Personal Diary of Bennett, which will show and detail our relationships with the rest of the characters in the novel
● Videos, this point depends exclusively on whether I can change my PC, but it is something that I would like to include (I already have a video layout, but for the rendering times, I am unable to create it).
And in the long run, I would like to add: Predefined Missions and Adventures that directly impact the development of Bennett's history. And to be able to launch the novel also for cell phones.
Final words: I hope with all my heart that you like this project and everyone can enjoy it as I am enjoying doing it, so I have decided that EVERYONE can enjoy this novel without paying. But I'm not going to lie to you: I also would like to be able to get some money, or at least to be able to recover the invested one, clearly I´m not trying to get rich with this project, only to be able to recover some of the money spend. Some things, like the textures of the 3D models, the storage in the cloud to render the images remotely, or the translation of the texts (I am from Argentina and English is not my native language), have a cost, and from my heart I tell you that it is worth every penny spent on this novel, but of course, it wouldn´t be bad if I can recover some of the money spent hahaha. Just say goodbye to you with a big hug and thank you for being part of this project which is so important to me. Hug

name: Meseugaki Yeong-ae-nim!
summary: "Twenty questions party with Young-ae!"

name: Merge Archers: Bow and Arrow
summary: Are you ready to fight for your king? Notch your arrows and join the war of bow and arrow! Merge bowmasters and create the strongest stickman archery squad to defend the castle. Play one of the coolest arrow games, become the greatest stickman archer hero and win the bow and arrow war!

name: Mental Hospital VR
summary: Mental Hospital VR is a truly scary first-person stealth horror game. Discover heart-thumping terror, chase and scary creatures in this atmospheric horror game.

name: Metal Gear Solid: Portable Ops Plus
summary: A standalone expansion to Metal Gear Solid: Portable Ops, mainly focused on multiplayer. A single player mode called Infinity Mission was included, but has no story. There are also new missions and tutorials for beginners. With up to 6 players via WiFi, new characters including Old Snake from Metal Gear Solid 4, Roy Campbell, and Raiden from Metal Gear Solid 2, this game continues the trend of capturing and recruiting comrades.

name: Mekanism
summary: 12 maps of orange and purple.

name: Melrose Café
summary: Join other players from around the world in 25-minute work / 5-minute break sessions where everyone is focused on their own tasks. Make the castle a place where you can rest or join others to be more productive rid of any distractions. Find a spot, set your goals, and enjoy the atmosphere.

name: Mercenaries: 4th Generation Warfare
summary: Employ mercenary groups to fortify your national armed forces with battle-hardened professionals. You can also carry out "unofficial" military operations without being held directly responsible by international bodies.

name: Megaman X Unleashed
summary: Megaman X Unleashed is a fangame with the intention of showing that there are still Megaman fans around the world. This project has the mission to create a fighting game based on the series Megaman X in 32-bit style, reviving the nostagia and putting a dream to see mavericks fighting against others in a 2d reindeer in practice with more than 20 selectable characters, including bosses and Secret Characters.

name: Meiji Seifu no Yuuga na Hitotoki
Metropolismania 2
summary: The player's job is to create and maintain a city. Played from a third-person perspective, the player needs to walk around, construct buildings, provide roads, and then screen the emails of possible inhabitants. Citizens need to be kept happy by interacting with them - give them gifts, listen to their gossip and complaints. If their needs are attended to (through schools, hospitals or entertainment), they will ditch the town. Build commercial, utility, entertainment industries to appease your citizens and make this a city people want to live in.

name: Mega Man Permafrost
summary: ...features 5 polished stages, 4 smaller secret stages, original art and assets, a completely original soundtrack, and more!

name: MetaGods
summary: MetaGods is the next generation Play-to-Earn Action Massively Multiplayer Online RPG. Earn epic NFT loot by exploring dungeons and slaying mythical monsters. Bring along your friends from any Metaverse and earn even more rewards.

name: Mean Bean Tsuu
summary: Mean Bean Tsuu is a hack which aims to be a sequel to the original game, featuring new mechanics from Puyo Puyo Tsuu, as well as a story more in line with that of Japanese Classic Sonic canon.

name: Mermaid
summary: In the near future, the climate will warm, the glaciers will melt, and the last land mass will disappear, and the Earth will enter an ocean age. This catastrophic change reduced the population. In order to continue civilization, human beings started the "Merman project".

name: Meteor Rain
summary: Grab, Shoot and Smash meteors!

name: Mechabot Defender
summary: Bob and weave through hordes of corrupt robots and hold them back with your trusty turrets! Mechabot Defender is a casual sci-fi arcade game with rogue-lite elements. Upgrade your turrets separately in unique ways, use unique character abilities, and create powerful synergies.

name: Meteors
summary: Meteors is a clone of the 1979 arcade game Asteroids from Atari.

name: Mechanism
summary: adventure/horror/depressive

name: Medarot 9: Kuwagata Version
summary: The ninth numbered installment of the Medabots/Medarot series.

name: Memory Puzzle: Futanari Boss
summary: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a Futanari boss and her co-workers at the office, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Melbourne Cup Challenge
summary: Horse simulator game based on the Melbourne cup.

name: Medusa's Labyrinth
summary: Medusa’s Labyrinth is a mythological first person horror game set in ancient Greece. It takes myths and legends that have stayed with us for over 2000 years and mix them together in a game that blends horror with stealth into a unique experience.The player will have to carefully pick their path through the abandoned hallways on Temple Island, through winding catacombs and dark corners to solve the mysteries that lurk within the labyrinth.

name: Metroid FreezeFlame
summary: A mod for Metroid Zero Mission

name: Metroid: Takeover
summary: Takeover is a Metroid Zero Mission hack with layout changes, changed tilesets, sprites, and palettes.

name: Metroid: Desolation
summary: A romhack for Metroid: Zero Mission with multiple endings.

name: Metropolitan Mayhem
summary: Metropolitan Mayhem is a 15-map mod for Duke Nukem 3D (Atomic Edition). It's themetically very close to the original first and third episodes (LA Meltdown & Shrapnel City) of Duke Nukem 3D, concentrating almost exclusively on classic urban-themed maps.

name: Merge Me!
summary: An idle merge game for your fun and relaxation. Combine various monsters, buy upgrades, unlock powerful artifacts and try to complete the game.

name: Meanderer
summary: Meanderer is a unique roguelite game set in a world of loss and rebirth. Embark on a pilgrimage with a young monk to make the Sun bright once more. Traverse the ruins of fallen empires, encounter strange endearing characters, and sacrifice your powers as you get closer to fulfilling your purpose.

name: Megaton Musashi W: Wired - Rogue: Brahms Knight - Night Black
summary: Here come Rogues in limited-edition colors that can't be attained from drops or paints!

name: Menagerie II: Presentable Liberty
summary: A prisoner tries to figure out what has happened to the outside world with the help of mysterious correspondents.

name: Mega 99Vidas
summary: Mega 99Vidas is a port of the beat 'em up for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive.

name: Megamind: Bad. Blue. Brilliant
summary: A 2D side-scroller game for mobile phones.

name: Mega Man 3 Mobile
summary: Mega Man 3 Mobile is the mobile port of Mega Man 3 (NES). It was released for mobile phones and had adjustments to make the game playable on numeric keypads.

name: Mega Box 2
summary:
Second bundle from Dinamic Software Games 
 
01. Navy Moves 
02. After the War 
03. Satan 
04. Narco Police 
05. Mega Phoenix 
06. Hammer Boy 
 
PC Version also includes a demo from Risky Woods

name: Metal Pear
summary:
YOUTUBE HEADQUARTERS is the name of a highly armed office in the depths of FUENGIROLA where MASI is held captive by LMDSHOW. It is the mission of ILLOJUAN, one of the members of the PATXINGARS secret army, to follow KNEKRO's instructions and infiltrate YOUTUBE HEADQUARTERS to defeat LMDSHOW and rescue MASI. FORWARD ILLOJUAN!"

Game made for IlloJam 2024

name: Medieval Merge: Epic Adventure
summary: This farm has a story to tell. A land full of mystery awaits! In every corner lies a new discovery in this world of epic adventure as you help our heroine fulfill her quest.

name: Metabolis
summary: In this surreal platformer, released in 1985 for the Commodore 64 and ZX Spectrum, you have been transformed into a bird, and must fight to save the human race from the invading Kremins by exploring an expansive world and collecting useful items.

name: Mezase Pachi Pro: Pachio-kun
summary:
The first game to feature Pachio-kun, the mascot for a series of pachinko-themed games by Coconuts Japan, Mezase Pachi Pro: Pachio-kun ("Aiming For Pachinko Pro: Pachio-kun") is simply a virtual pachinko hall with 72 different machines on which the player may try their luck.

The game rewards attentive pachinko veterans by having several of the machines possess quirks, such as the frequency of payouts, certain pins being bent that will favor a ball's route to the bottom and the like. Pachio-kun simply has to lean in to examine the machines closer to ascertain how to make the machine pay out. The overall goal is to keep playing each machine, winning either through a determined strategy or simple perseverance, until all the machines have been emptied of their contents. Doing so will win the game.

name: Megaton Musashi W: Wired - Attire: Momoka - Yukata
summary: New Pilot Attire is here to jazz up your wardrobe during sorties!

name: Merlin: The Game
summary: Merlin the Game is a real time cooperative fantasy-adventure game. Show your heroism, prove your camaraderie, live the adventure.

name: Meet In Paris
summary: "Love in flower capital" is a galgame. Lian Feng, a young man full of expectations, sailed across the sea to France on the "Bordeaux" cruise ship and embarked on the road of pursuing truth. In front of the journey - Paris, the capital of flowers in full bloom,

name: Memories
summary: Memories is a sapphic visual novel dress-up game where clothes are linked to painful memories of a failed relationship.

name: Metal Heads
summary: Party game for up to 8 player local or online for metal heads, by a metal head, that is about characters who literally have metal heads! Featuring over 30 mini-games, multiple board game modes, and character customization, mini-game and board game level editors, with much more content to come!

name: Melody's Melon Mania
summary: Embark on a delightful free-to-play puzzle-solving journey with Projekt Melody in Melody's Melon Mania!

name: Medieval Real Estate
summary: Start with 300 gold. Make the right investments to make even more gold in Medieval Real Estate.

name: Mega Games 6 Vol. 3
summary: Mega 6 Vol. 3 is a compilation of Sega Mega Drive/Genesis games released in PAL territories during 1995, and was included as part of the console's late official bundles. The cartridge was the final release in the series of Mega Games compilations, and contains 6 of Sega's most successful games from the early days of the Genesis. It is the only volume of the Mega Games 6 series to introduce a new game to the Mega Games range, and the only Mega Games release to use the shortened Mega 6 title. The game came with individual instruction manuals for each game rather than integrating them all into a single manual. This compilation utilises the standard game selection screen seen in previous Sega compilation releases, including the Mega Games series, Classic Collection and Sonic Classics.

name: Medieval Kingdom Wars: Greater World
summary: Rule the MKW world as never before! From North Africa to Scandinavia, the Greater World is yours to conquer! This update doubles number of playable factions and greatly expands the world map. Completely compatible with MKW Royal Blood. So marshal your armies, my lord, The Greater World awaits.

name: Mercury
summary: Mercury is postmodern sci-fi first-person shooter set in the year 2052 where you take the role of Mercury agent of the Special Operations Command Center undergoing tremendous missions in an effort to stop the development of a super weapon by the Soviets.

name: Medieval Cop: Medieval Angel
summary:
It is centered around Amber Heart, a newly minted police officer in Rightia. Join Amber as she investigates the progressively strange occurrences in her daily life.

Medieval Angel is a spin-off series of Medieval Cop, and is also created by GeminiGamer, aka VasantJ.

name: Metroid Confrontation 2: Return to SR388
summary:
Metroid Confrontation 2: Return to SR388 is a NES Metroid hack, based on Gameboy’s Metroid 2 and a little bit inspired by AM2R. Made using the Editroid program (created by Snarfblam).

A lot of things has ben modified: All graphics (backgrounds and sprites), all map, text and music; to look like Metroid 2. Unarmored samus sprites were based on rogue dawn hack.

name: Metamorphic Force
summary: The Evil King has risen from the dead to rule the world once more. The Greek goddess Athena has summoned the souls of four ancient guardians and bestowed their power upon four heroes to stop the evil once again. These guardians wield the ability to shift into anthropomorphic beasts to fight their enemies.

name: M.E.M.E.S.
summary: You awaken in the eternal dimensions after living a life filled with meaningful suffering. Mr. ™ will show you around, and lead you to ACCOMPLISHEMENT. M.E.M.E.S. is a non-linear minimalistic RPG with an eerie vibe and surreal humor.

name: Mess Cleanup
summary: Think you can find any item in a mess? Mess Cleanup challenges you! Search for items and move on to the next challenging levels. Collect points and use your limited time wisely.

name: Memorabilia: Mia's Mysterious Memory Machine
summary: A hidden object / match-3 game in which Mia helps the residents of Berryside Mews to find their lost items by locating and piecing together memory fragments with a mind reading machine.

name: Mendacium
summary: Enter the prehistoric world dominated by primal reptiles. Fight through savage enemies and bosses with the combination of melee & ranged combat and elemental magic. Explore the vast handpainted world and try to prevent the meteor from wiping out all life on the planet.

name: Memory Puzzle: Bad Girl
summary: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a young bad girl, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: MechCorp
summary: A turn-based tactics game with a strategic layer where you take command of a mercenery mech squadron.

name: Me Monstar: Hear Me Roar!
summary:
Feed on dreams to beat the opposition.
Enter a bizarre world formed of people's dreams and imagination, where haggis is a weapon and fear is your enemy.
Travel the Roaring Road and battle with other Monstars, fears and nightmares to earn your claws, horns and roar.
Smack, slash, headbutt, punch and chomp your way around 30 crazy, challenging stages.

name: Memory Match Saga: Expansion Pack 5
summary: Memory Match Saga - Expansion Pack 5 - A classic memory game that will improve your memory and brain power. You can spend the pleasant and leisure time with the game, meanwhile you can test and improve your memory and attention, whether you are a child or an adult.

name: Mechanical Star Astra
summary: Mechanical Star Astra is a colorful, stylish, high energy bullet hell shoot 'em up. It mixes a solid arcade foundation with more modern elements to deliver a full package filled with a large variety of content that many kinds of action game players can enjoy.

name: M.exe
summary: Welcome to M.exe! The competitive, multiplayer, monster battle arena. As a trainer, you will give your monster commands in battle to come out on top. Victory or defeat will depend completely on your skill as a monster trainer. Explore the different moves and monster types, plan out your strategies, and become the best monster trainer that there ever was!

name: Mech Commander Gold
summary: MechCommander Gold adds a new campaign, introduces difficulty settings & patches a few things about the main game.

name: Meteor Clash
summary: Casual and endless with challenging gameplay for all ages. Explore space through unique maps and space ships, unlock achievements, beat others in the leaderboard and have fun!

name: Medchess
summary: Build and manage your own medieval village while maintaining the balance between gold, army, technology, and faith. Will you survive the bandits and pollution in Medchess?

name: MemoryMaze
summary: MemoryMaze is an atmospheric puzzle-platformer where you roll through vibrant, wind-swept levels, shift realities, and use the environment to solve puzzles. Explore hidden paths in a world full of color and mystery.

name: Melon Simulator
summary: Melon Simulator is a chaotic, multiplayer, first person melee combat game. Almost anything that isn't nailed down can be used to whack, slice, and throw at the oncoming melon hoard...

name: Merlin vs Zombies
summary: Here is a game in which you have to use the fireballs to destroy enemies. Defend your castle with a variety of magical ballistic missiles.

name: Mend Arcade Battle
summary: MEND Arcade Battle is a turn-based RPG inspired by Fighting Game core mechanics. Players must tackle the Fighting Game staple challenge known as Arcade Mode with a Turn-based RPG twist! Choose your character and follow their path to defeating the final boss awaiting them at the end.

name: Meow-Jong Solitaire
summary: Meow-Jong is a modern take on the classic puzzle game Mahjong Solitaire, but with cats!

name: Mechanic Mechanica
summary:
It's an action fighting game where you are able to customize your mech, similar in content to Custom Robo.

A prototype cartridge was found in 2021.

name: Mermaid Secrets12 - Heartbreak Love Story
summary: Heartbreak Girl–School Boy's Crush

name: Meteor Blastor
summary: An Asteroid type game. It was one of the first two games by the studio Flipline Studios, and it was released in October 17th 2006 on their website as a Flash Game.

name: Meow'n'Dash
summary: Meow 'n' Dash is a tiny, highly-addictive and fast paced arcade game. Play as one of the adorable kittens and clear stages by turning all the yarn balls to the same color by pushing them against each other.

name: Meatball the Mite
summary: Introducing Meatball the Mite! Explore the rotting corpse of an indistinct creature and find upgrades!

name: Metamorphism
summary: This map started out for vanilla doom2.exe but we quickly pushed the limits. Several days before release however, the HOM's and VPO's were vaporized with MANY thanks to BSP. QWERTY and stx-Vile are credited with pinpointing them.

name: Meikyuu no Dollpolis
summary: It's an action game where you advance through a mysterious dungeon whose shape changes every time you enter, while strengthening the functions of your aircraft.

name: Metris II
summary: Is a block falling game, with many additive.

name: Mezase! Top Pro Green ni Kakeru Yume
summary: Mezase! Top Pro Green ni Kakeru Yume is a Sports game, developed and published by Jaleco Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Metroid: Lost Chozo
summary:
I crashed land on a strange planet due to the failure of the spacecraft, and Power Suit was completely damaged after impact. So, I had to explore this strange planet.
With custom music, environments, bosses and more!

name: Meet Santa
summary:
Santa's a busy guy - delivering presents to all the good boys and girls in the world in one night is no easy task! That's why he's decided to make his work easier this year - for all the lucky children in line to meet Santa at the Happytown Mall today, he's going to just give them what they want early! But he could really use a helper - how about YOU?
In this game, YOU are Santa's #1 helper. When the children tell Santa what they want for Christmas, you have to flick them the present that they want. But be quick- these kids change their mind fast! How high of a score can you get before your time runs out?

name: Mega Schwarzschild
summary: Mega Schwarzschild (メガシュヴァルツシルト) is a Sega Mega-CD simulation game released exclusively in Japan.

name: Medieval towers
summary: Medieval towers is a strategy game in which you play as the leader of a magical squad and have an exciting military adventure.

name: Meimon! Tako Nishi Ouendan
summary: Meimon! Tako Nishi Ouendan is a strategy game released exclusively in Japan for the NES (Famicom) in 1989, and is based on Juzo Tokoro's 1984 manga series of the same name (which was also adapted into a anime motion picture in 1987). Players control a gang of "ouedan" who must battle their way back to their turf after being ambushed on an island.

name: Men of War: Assault Squad - Skirmish Pack
summary: Receive a full set of 5 new skirmish missions, 1 for each faction, USA, Germany, Soviet Union, Commonwealth, Japan. Objectives of the missions are very different to the existing ones in Men of War: Assault Squad and provide a completely new challenge as your task is to defend four strategic positions against waves of enemy troops to hold out long enough to launch a counter attack and finally defeat the enemy.

name: Mean Beans: Manly Hat Pack
summary: Fight your friends in style with these 15 crazy hats!

name: Mean Beans: I Paid Money For This Pack
summary: The most exclusive bean drip there is! Show everyone you spent $20 of these sweet tricked-out bumper cars!

name: Mean Beans: Party Hat Pack
summary: Drown your bean in some sweet drip with these 15 awesome cosmetics!

name: Memory Hunters
summary: A classic RPG where you will experience unique places, solve puzzles, fight turn-based battles and live an exciting adventure.

name: MetaWorld
summary: MetaWorld® invites you explore a persistent 10,000 square mile, massively scaled open world together. Discover endless activities and adventure, inside a real-time physics simulation allowing thousands of visitors to participate simultaneously online.

name: Memoria: Stories of La Garma
summary: 16,500 years ago, a group of humans came back to their shelter in Spain after hunting. The entrance had collapsed, leaving everything trapped inside. Narrated by Geraldine Chaplin, this VR experience invites you to explore the memories of the cave, untouched and preserved for thousands of years.

name: Meow Legion
summary: Meow Legion is an action-packed strategy game where players assemble an army of cats, level them up, and defend against waves of enemies while exploring the map for cats to join their legion.

name: Memory Illusions
summary: Memory Illusions is a single player VR looter shooter featuring realistic weapons, upgrades, attachments, randomize options, and player progression in fast paced action environments.

name: Merchant's Rush
summary: Roguelike merchant simulator in the times of crisis.

name: Memory Puzzle: Mile High Fun
summary: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a Futanari flight attendant and her 2 passengers on a private jet, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 2: Custom Pet Pack Vol. 2
summary: Two rearranged music tracks for the in-game music player and a "Special Skin" that changes the appearance of the 3D MegaMan on the menu screen.

name: Mega Met
summary: A Mega Man fan game which features Metalls (Mets) as the entire cast of characters, enemies and bosses.

name: Memories of Glass Maiden
summary: An adventure game that lets you enjoy the story and flow of the 'Glass universe,'

name: Merriment Carrying Caravan
summary: The game is set on the colonial planet Grant, which is less than a century old since it was colonized. Spaceships regularly come in search of resources. The player will run a caravan on this wilderness planet, trade goods and export resources from all over the planet. At the same time, we have to raise our four daughters.

name: MegaTraveller 1: The Zhodani Conspiracy
summary:
The Zhodani and the Third Imperium, the two largest human societies in charted space, have been in conflict since first establishing contact in the year 500 (5018 on the Earth calendar). Each society's gradual expansion eventually led to an historic meeting in a backwater region of space known as the Spinward Marches.

Although their human physical appearances were exactly alike, several fundamental differences existed between the two great powers. The Zhodani's political structure was strictly authoritarian, whereas the Imperium was governed by the rule of the Emperor, a classic aristocracy. As the Zhodani race evolved, the human brain's potential was explored and mastered until the use of powerful psionics was a way of life. Mind-reading, telekinesis, extrasensory perception and clairvoyance became common among the Zhodani. The Imperium disdainfully outlawed the use of any form of psionics, believing these strange powers to be an invasion of mental privacy. Also, because the Zhodani utilized their superior mental ability in everyday life, many Imperial traders and merchants grew suspicious of their motives and avoided negotiations with the Zhodani.
The Imperial race, lacking psionics, saw its development grow along creative, artistic and emotional paths. And as with any creative society, wondrous achievement and joy was often coupled with imperfections and greed. The Zhodani - viewing the Imperial race as dishonest, morally corrupt, weak and insecure - lived highly structured and unemotional lifestyles. With two powerful societies so clearly opposed in political and social beliefs, confrontation was inevitable.

As the Zhodani continued to expand into the Spinward Marches, many worlds were peacefully integrated into the Zhodani Consulate. However, several independent worlds resisted the Zhodani, believing that they would lose their freedom and be forced to live under restrictive rule. The Spinward Marches became an intergalactic 'hot spot' and the aggressive advances of the Zhodani led to the first of several conflicts known as the Frontier Wars,the first of which began in 589 - 89 years after the two great powers first established contact.

name: Meme Barley-Break
summary: Meme Barley-Break is simple puzzle game where you need to collect memes according to the rules of the Barley-Break. Collect Barley-Break with memes and pump your mind!

name: Mechanic Story
summary:
Victory loves preparation!
Boys will always be boys and they love to ride, brake and fix the cars. Bring your top car workshop in your smartphone today, if you wanna win the real race tomorrow.
A role playing and informative game where whole city owns the car but no one knows how to carry them, But its time for you to fix them all. Be a passionate Mechanic and upgrade a long queue of cars in your performance shop, paint shop, car wash center and modification studio. Set the right tune and right attitude of racing cars.

name: Mega Tower Assault
summary:
Mega Tower Assault is a tower defence game similar to Desktop Tower Defense or Fieldrunners. As with other games of its kind, the idea is to prevent wave after wave of enemy troops to get to the player's command center. This is done by building stationary turrets that automatically shoot at the enemies that come within their range. At the start of the game the player has a small sum of cash that can be spent on different turrets such as chain guns, missiles and flame throwers. By destroying enemy troops and surviving waves the player gets more money that can be used for building new turrets or upgrade old turrets.

The game consists of four different scenarios (beach, snow, platform and lava) each with three levels. A level consists of 20 or more enemy waves and once completed the next is unlocked. While the first scenario (beach) is straightforward tower defending the later scenarios adds additional level features that lead to further tactical considerations for the player. In the snow scenario enemy soldiers can travel safely underground while the platform levels feature conveyor belts that increase the speed of the troops. The lava levels feature platforms that can be moved around by the player. Some levels have neutral buildings that can taken over by engineers. The player then receivers a special function that can be used at any time, for example a rocket attack that destroys all enemy troops.

name: Metro
summary: A digital implementation of the board game about building the Paris Métro.

name: Megatudo 2096
summary:
It is the year 2096, and the Megatudo Grand Prix is on! 12 pilots from 12 manufacturers, each with their own unique Maneuver Wear, will fight to win the tournament.

Each character has their own set of normal and special attacks, as well as the ability to dash and weave in different directions.

name: Meatlymakes
summary: An indie developer will stop at nothing to finish his game.

name: Mech Arena
summary:
Mech Arena is a fast-paced PvP mech shooter with competitive mayhem for everyone.

Choose from dozens of Weapons and Mechs with special abilities for endless combinations. Fight with friends or compete in a global arena of players, maps, and modes.

Take on the world in the most explosive, fun, and chaotic sport the future has to offer

name: Metalstorm Online
summary: Experience the action packed multiplayer jet fighting game for iOS! Featuring dozens of unique and customizable aircraft to choose from, full 360-degree flight in 3D space, gyroscope for extra precise controls, and Survival Mode against waves of enemies.

name: Megatect
summary:
Essentially, Megatect is a multiplayer map builder without limitation!
Use a plethora of blocks, objects, and wires to create your own challenge maps, arenas, new sport, whatever you can dream up!

name: Meander Forth: Teak's Tall Tale Plus
summary: Two Tales Begin Anew!

name: Meowhalla
summary: What can be better than cat girls? Only cat girls—Vikings! Meet the visual novel that will tell you an awesome story about cat girl intrigues in the outskirts of Valhalla.

name: Meander Forth
summary: Meander Forth is a platform game about an otter named Garret Rapids, who discovers that a curse has caused all of his friends to disappear! To find them, Garret must learn to master a magic known as Dark Cadence, which gives him the power to shoot bubbles, skate on ice, climb walls, and more! Not everything is as it seems, however, as Garret's search uncovers the web of secrets that cursed his friends in the first place.

name: Mech Ace Combat Trainer
summary: Mech Ace's action combat gameplay, intuitive controls, and sci-fi atmosphere will completely immerse you within the game world.

name: Mechanic Master 2
summary: Mechanic Master 2 offers an exciting new gameplay feature for this crazy puzzler: disassemble objects to create hybrid gadgets. Players are challenged by 110 new levels, and must use dozens of new objects (60+ in total) to make things work out. New drawable shapes in Drawing Mode include the magnet, ball and black hole. There's also a built-in level editor, and you can share your levels with friends via a local wireless connection.

name: Meow Playground
summary: Meow Playground is an online game that lets you play as a cute animal character. In the game, you have the opportunity to improve your character, communicate with other players, and participate in a variety of games and activities, such as fishing or playing tag and dodgeball. Additionally, you can customize and decorate your own house to your liking. With so many options and possibilities, Meow Playground offers endless fun for anyone who loves animals and online gaming!

name: Metal Mission 2015: Dino Island
summary: An evil force holds an island, where they revived Jurassic dinosaurs with a mysterious technology, and use them as their super-weapons! You will break into the enemy's camp alone, go through heavy fires, and ultimately save the world!

name: Mean Machines
summary: Mean Machines is a one-of-a-kind action-racing game inspired by Demolition Derby, RC Racing and Robot Wars. With beautifully textured environments, realistic physics and damage models and a tremendous variety of content and game modes, Mean Machines is your definitive daily dose of action in the most accessible, pick-up-and-play package for mobile!

name: Meanwhile: An Interactive Comic Book - Extra: The Case of the Missing Science Project
summary: A standalone comic by Jason Shiga, available as a print-and-staple PDF file.

name: Medal of Guardians
summary: In a world where medals have power, players can choose from a variety of jobs, including knight, mage, priest, and archer, to fight monsters and strengthen their characters to their liking. This is an online action shooting game that can be enjoyed alone or with others.

name: Medusa VR
summary: Medusa, the Croatian word for jellyfish. Medusa VR is 10 minute solo-developed VR film. Join Russel and Zlatan - two Croatian actors in Califonia for a coffee by the canal as they discuss grief, change and loss. When on strange shores, would you swim with Medusas?

name: Medieval and Secrets
summary: Medieval and Secrets - 3D, game, In which you observe the Middle Ages, look for precious objects

name: Metal War
summary: This is a fast-paced top-down shooting and tower defense game. You need to customize and upgrade your chariot, build defensive structures to protect your base, explore the world and destroy all enemies! Don't forget to come back and defend when the enemy attacks! Can you make it to the end?

name: Meadow Fun!!
summary: Meadow Fun!! is a game for all ages, where players have to gather, with their magic nets, stray animals, along 20 colorful and relaxing levels. All set in a dreamy environment, with a soft and charming original sound track. Gamepad, keyboard and mouse supported. Steam controller supported in game.

name: Metaverse Construction Kit
summary: The Metaverse Construction Kit is a virtual environment to construct your own 3D creations. Use the twenty-four structural elements to define your structures and then style your creations with sixty-four material types like organics, metals, minerals, and composites. Then Publish!

name: MegaRamp
summary: In this game you have to position the game elements in a exact way to get the ball from the top of a ramp inside a basket on its botton. The game uses real world physics on the ball movement and all your sense of localization will be demanded to complete the challenges.

name: Metal Black: Alternative
summary: An NCSoft title that appears to be Diablo with guns from the same 2nd person perspective, and in real time action.

name: Metroid: Deep Freeze
summary: Deep Freeze is a small Zero Mission hack with new environments, item progression, and more.

name: Metal World: Street Scraps
summary: Metal World is an endless racing game set in a retrofuturistic world, exploring different eras and themes, assemble your vehicle with scrap parts to travel long paths, test your reflexes and drive at high speed!

name: Mencia: A Never Was Tale
summary: Mencia: A Never Was Tale., is a styled rogue-like, 2D platform, in which you will have to face agains an invasion of cute aliens using the properties a magic sword will give you. Let's go!

name: Merchants of the Caribbean
summary: Head to the Caribbean in search of lost treasure! Build factories, produce resources, manage the economy, win sea battles and save the islanders from witchcraft.

name: Meow
summary: Meow is a cute exploration game where you control a cat on an island.

name: Merge Gangster Heist vs. Police
summary: Prepare yourself for an intense Mafia simulation game adventure! Take charge of cunning enterprises, assemble skilled Capos to execute your commands, and seize fresh territories by any means necessary. Exercise your freedom: demand protection fees, carry out robberies, engage in street battles. Embrace either benevolent leadership or ruthless crime lord status. The choice is yours when it comes to whom you steal from and what you pilfer!

name: Metronome
summary: A metronome application by Nintendo for DSiWare that along with classic metronome functions also includes a mini game called Donkey Metronome.

name: Mega Man 8: Anniversary Collector's Edition
summary:
A gigantic space explosion sends two strange meteors crashing to Earth, the call goest out and Mega Man speeds to the site. There he sees his arch-rival, Dr. Wily, fleeing the scene, clutching one of the mysterious metallic meteors. Now Mega Man must uncover the secret of the second meteor in a race to stay one step ahead of Dr. Wily and his new deadly breed of super-powered robots.

With the whole cast assembled for Mega Man's 32-bit debut and an exclusive onscreen Mega Man 8 Japanese art collection, the 10th anniversary edition is the ultimate mega package, the Blue Bomber's back!

name: Melvor Idle: Atlas of Discovery
summary: Atlas of Discovery, Melvor Idle’s second expansion, is all about exploration! Discover eight new Combat Areas packed with dozens of monsters to fight and hundreds of new items to find. Unlock two new exploration skills, try the all-new Ancient Relics Gamemode… and more!

name: Media Is Dead. You Are Alive.
summary:
"Media Is Dead, You Are Alive" is a game about the frustration at the lack of awareness of how internet media is consumed. As the internet has permeated our lives, how we engage with media has changed. While we look outside of ourselves for answers, entertainment, and connection we must also be conscious of how that media shapes us. It's all too easy to lose oneself if you aren't careful.

Created as part of of Ambient Mixtape 16: a collection of original curated works surrounding a central theme: "After Hours".

name: MechWarrior 4: Clan 'Mech Pak
summary:
In August 2002, Microsoft released two add-ons to MechWarrior 4: Vengeance: Clan 'Mech Pak and Inner Sphere 'Mech Pak. Each pack contained four new BattleMechs and a few other bonuses, such as new weapons.

Clan Mech Pak includes:
- Arctic Wolf
- Cauldron-Born
- Kodiak
- Masakari

name: Metal
summary: Knowledge can be the most powerful tool or the deadliest weapon. To survive you must balance destruction and creation.

name: Megan The Fox
summary: Megan the Fox is an endless shooting game developed by Ninja Kiwi, where you play as a fox named Megan and must survive against an onslaught of enemies for as long as you can, all while collecting gems to get equipped with upgrades.

name: Memories of Fireflies
summary: Confront your darkness in Memories of Fireflies, a Voxel-based Puzzle Platformer which takes place in a dark and dangerous world that you must venture to discover its secrets. Overcome challenges, enemies and puzzles to get even deeper in this dangerous world.

name: Metallicars
summary: Metallicars is a new way of racing where intelligence rules over ability.

name: Metris 3
summary: magnussoft

name: Me and Myself
summary: Lily, a little girl who lost her parents in a car accident, lives in a big empty house. She really wants to have a friend with whom she could pass the tough time. One day, she finally get a friend, from mirror...

name: Merge 5: 10x10 Color
summary:
Merge 5 is a new Block Match puzzle game.
Train your brain and develop your logic with this simple game that lets you combine puzzle blocks in 10x10 grid, build and destroy structures by creating new color shapes.

name: Metro Conflict
summary: A free to play futuristic multiplayer FPS featuring class based combat.

name: Mega Alberto Cousins
summary: Shapeshifting platformer

name: Meet Again Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes:
- 9 Clues 2: The Ward
- Ghost Files: Memory of a Crime
- Family Mysteries 2: Echoes of Tomorrow

name: Meta Match
summary: Meta Match is a unique take on the popular match-3 formula. Move the player block across the board and swap places with neighbouring blocks. Unleash the power of Metamorphosis mode and let the scores soar to unimagined heights!

name: Mesh NG
summary:
Mesh is an eye popping, ear pleasing, nerve wracking game of skill and reflexes!
In this game you use your finger to destroy neon blocks that fall through the mesh in an attempt to get the highest score. But watch out for the "special" blocks which can end the run or have unforeseen effects on the gameplay! The more you play the harder it gets, but the better you get the higher the scores!

name: Metal Hunter
summary: Top-down 3D shoot 'em up game in which you play as a robot that fights for survival against other robots. Your only goal is to kill all your enemies until you are the last one standing.

name: Memory Match Saga: Expansion Pack 11
summary: Memory Match Saga - Expansion Pack 11 - A classic memory game that will improve your memory and brain power. You can spend the pleasant and leisure time with the game, meanwhile you can test and improve your memory and attention, whether you are a child or an adult. With this DLC you will unlock Rpg Weapons memory theme.

name: Meong
summary: A game featured in Action 52. Board game of strategy and skill. Try to get pieces from starting line to goal. Watch out for hidden traps. Harder than it sounds.

name: Mega Man 2 Lite
summary:
Battle with the blue bomber through the entire woodman stage in this “Lite” version of the console classic platformer.

Dr. Wily is at it again and only the noble Mega Man has any hope of defeating the mad scientist and his army of robot minions.

Tons of options allow you to play Mega Man II Lite your way! Take on Dr. Wily and his robot army in both portrait mode and landscape mode. Test your mettle in Classic mode with all the enemies and action you remember, or toggle it off and enjoy a rebalanced gameplay experience with more forgiving controls, scaled-down enemies and an auto-fire option.

name: Mega Man: Four Hounds
summary:
Mega Man Four Hounds is a new fangame in development, inspired by the classic Mega Man games developed over the years, official and fanmade. This specific fangame seeks to up the stakes in terms of challenge, personality, graphics, story, and music to provide a truly memorable experience.

Players can choose to play as Mega Man, Proto Man, or Bass, with each character having their own unique upgrades and playstyles. Dr. Wily is up to no good again, and it's up to our heroes to stop him!

This game's roster of Robot Masters includes a new series dubbed the Super Light Numbers, consisting of Smirk Man, Scorch Woman, Static Man, Wing Man, Poison Man, Meteor Man, Root Man, and Ooze Man. Each of these characters bring a unique difficulty and charm never before seen.

name: Mental Math Madness
summary: An educational casual game designed to improve mental math skills. Before you are hordes of math equations that require rapid solving and shooting, all while dodging incoming projectiles. Gather gold to upgrade your lives and take on increasingly challenging levels and topics.

name: Memoria
summary: Help Elena's grandma retrieve her precious memories from the past in Memoria! A compelling story-driven adventure through grandma's neighbourhood. Dive into unique 2D platformer challenges located in the mysterious past to collect grandma's memories.

name: MetaDude
summary: Please connect, my user!

name: Mechatroniks Attack
summary: Mechatroniks Attack is an amateur very difficult action game. Try the Demo version to check if you like it and if your computer work with it.

name: Merge
summary: Merge is a minimalistic and easy to understand puzzle game... The goal is simple; Merge...

name: Mechanophagia
summary: Mechanophagia is a challenging bullet hell shooter with roguelite elements, set in a dark and gritty sci-fi world. Blast through waves of fleshy aberrations and defeat monstrous bosses. Can you outmaneuver the relentless enemy onslaught and save the robots from their inevitable extinction?

name: MegaMegaEggs
summary: Ghosts 'n Goblins × Mega Man × FallGuys!? Eggventure: No need for cooperation in A 2D Platform PvPvE Neo Retro Action Game! Aim for the Main Dish! Difficulty ★★★☆☆

name: Menace
summary:
This is a pure arcade game- a fast action packed journey through six very different worlds where lightning fast reflexes and furious fire button action are your only hope of survival.

Your mission orders are simple, you must destroy the planet Draconia. In theory possible, in practice...

The planet Draconia, an unnatural planet, has been formed over many centuries by six of the most feared rulers that have ever existed. These rulers, exiled from their home galaxy, have ravaged and plundered space, using the worlds they have destroyed and the life forms they have created to build this planet of fear and death.

Now an end must be put to their reign of terror. A large scale attack will prove too costly to our space fleets, Draconia has many orbiting defence systems, the sacrifice may be in thousands of lives. A single fighter craft, approaching undetected, may have a chance to avenge those who have perished, by destroying Draconia. You have that chance...

name: Memories of Loneliness
summary: Memories Of Loneliness is a short story of psychological horror, where you have to find out what happened.

name: Mega Twins
summary: The game takes the form of a side-scrolling platform game, with the players controlling the characters of the twins. The game can be played alone (in which case only one of the twins is present), or with two players together controlling one twin each.

name: Meteoric VR
summary: Meteoric VR is a low poly first-person space shooter where your mission is to protect the planet from incoming meteors.

name: Meryll wants a Cookie
summary: Grant a girl a cookie, anyway you can.

name: Medieval Towns
summary: A multiplayer game in medieval setting about survival, politics, building of towns and conquests. Try to survive in wild nature, gather resources, create or join clan, build town and fight for glory or resources!

name: Melting Encyclopedia
summary: Interactive 3d encyclopedia of alien dimensions

name: Metroid: The Blue Plague
summary: Explore an asteroid on a crash course with Earth, and find a way to destroy it. This asteroid has a dark past, however, and you will soon find that you are not alone... can you survive on it long enough to find its weak point and save our precious blue planet?

name: Merlin 64
summary:
Merlin was a macroassembler developed by mathematics professor Glen Bredon, initially running on the Apple II family under DOS 3.3, for the 6502 processor. The product was published commercially by Southwestern Data Systems, later known as Roger Wagner Publishing. Merlin continued to be updated as successors to the 6502 became available. 
 
Merlin included an integrated source code editor (initially a line editor; later versions included a full-screen editor) and also a disassembler, called Sourceror. 
 
Merlin was a popular assembler on the Apple II platform, and source files in Merlin format are common in Apple II archives today. Versions for the Commodore 64 and Commodore 128, dubbed Merlin 64 and Merlin 128 respectively, were also released.

name: MeMoMi
summary: A 2D psychological adventure game set in a body-like mystery world. Player's mission is to find a blue bird, a legendary feather that can save this body.

name: Metal Ape
summary: Metal Ape is a 2D souls-like metroidvania game where you play as a cyborg exploring a treacherous world filled with deadly enemies and dark secrets. Master brutal combat, wield powerful abilities, and journey deep into the abyss in search of the truth.

name: Merchant in Dungeon
summary: This is a Shop Management RPG game. pay off his huge debts and get rid of his engagement to an ugly girl, Heracles came to the Devil's reign to make money! The city is not only not as scary as it is said to be, but also full of beautiful girls?! A year-long trip to make money begins... ...

name: Metal Mutant
summary: Metal Mutant is a side-scrolling action-adventure game developed and published for MS-DOS, Amiga and Atari ST by Silmarils and released in 1991. It is similar to Game Arts' Thexder in that it allows you to transform at any time into three different robot forms (Cyborg, Dino and Tank).

name: Metal Casket
summary: Single player simple horror game, inspired by "Iron Lung"

name: Mental Repairs Inc
