name: Mesmerize: Distort
summary: Mesmerize is an Interactive art game developed by London Studio in association with Playlogic Entertainment for the PlayStation 3 platform, which utilizes the PlayStation Eye camera peripheral.

name: Metroid Heardle
summary:
A variation of Wordle dedicated to songs from the Metroid franchise.
It ended on September 27th, 2022.

summary: You have been lucky enough to be tasked with sorting the files in one of many archives across the land. However, you must share your income with 3 fellow citizens of a similar rank, and consequently decide their fate.

summary: The grind never stops.

name: Metamor Kid Goomin

summary: MEA CULPA is a Yume Nikki fan game, that follows a non-traditional format. You play as a young man, Isaiah who enters a dream-like state after listening to an old music box.

name: Meow Bistro!

Manage your own small and cute bistro well and become rich, meow!
Hello Boss, Meow!
Welcome to "Meow Bistro", meow!
In this game, you buy ingredients at the dawn market,
create dishes with these ingredients at your bistro,
and sell them to earn money, meow!
Buy fresh ingredients at the best prices, turn them into dishes, and sell them to customers to earn money, meow!

However, detailed story elements remain undisclosed, leaving only the setting of a hot, dreamy summer landscape.

name: Meatball
summary: Meatball - This is a game in which we play the role of a meatball...

Guide a young woman as she sets off on a desperate search for her fiancé amidst the annual celebration in Mexico. Moments after a spectral figure kidnaps her beloved during a card reading, she begins her journey to the afterworld, where demons will plot her demise and ancients gods will lend her a helping hand.

name: Mega-Bots
summary:
Megabots is a futuristic strategy game that utilizes 3D graphics, animation, music and sound effects.

The game begins with an introduction to set the scene before the player enters a grid filled with robots that might be good or bad. The objective to find a power cell within the grid to move on to the next level. Good robots can be interrogated for information. Bad robots must be destroyed with the right weapon before you can move past them. The strategy element comes from choosing the right weapons for the bad robots, and navigating the grid based on the information received to find the power cell before the player's own power reserve is depleted.

summary: Detective Red July must stop a serial killer who patterns his murders after optical illusions in this mystery visual novel set in the world of Methods.

name: Medieval Sex Jigsaw

name: Merchant Prince
summary: Merchant Prince is a DOS strategy game.

name: Memories of a Spy
summary: Collect intel, forge documents, blend in, hunt the mole. Immerse yourself in this first-person 1960s spy simulator. Work for CIA, MI6, SDECE, BND, or KGB. Defend your country or betray it, or choose to leave it all behind to live a normal life... as long as you can.

name: Mechanic 8230: Deluxe Edition
summary: Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.

name: MegaBattle
summary: Build robots and enter the arena to battle! Robots have taken control of the galaxy and now humans must build bots to fight in the MegaBattle Arena. MegaBattle combines the best of the CCG with innovative mechanics such as unique mana mode, opponent reading attack and a fast card draw system.

name: Meal: Mystery Escape Room
summary: Meal is a mystery escape room game, where you must solve a series of puzzles to progress and discover the truth behind an enigmatic hotel. With challenges and secrets, combining exploration, varied puzzles, and an intriguing story. Can you solve the puzzles and escape from the illuminated hotel?

name: MetaSpace
summary: MetaSpace is a 2D action strategy game. Explore the ever-changing planets and stars to gather resources and items to bolster your strength and your crew. But be vigilant! As with every action you take time will pass and as you use it to grow in strength so do your enemies!

name: Metal Sonic in Sonic the Hedgehog

name: Mentula Macanus: Apocolocyntosis
summary: A piece of Interactive Fiction. Is on the list Interactive Fiction Top 50 of all time (2015 edition).

name: Mega Virus Collection

name: Memory Match Saga: Expansion Pack 12
summary: Memory Match Saga - Expansion Pack 12 - A classic memory game that will improve your memory and brain power. You can spend the pleasant and leisure time with the game, meanwhile you can test and improve your memory and attention, whether you are a child or an adult. With this DLC you will unlock Rpg Weapons memory theme.

summary: The creepypasta game was written by FoxySonicMaster108

name: Metis: Shadow Days
summary: A world born from fluctuations, a pursuit of exploration and change. Players will take on the role of a field fuher at the Metis Biological Institute, meeting more companions on observation trips, making important choices, and searching for the origin and truth of fluctuations.

name: Meandering Fiend
summary: Explore tons of unique mazes with lots of places to get lost and turned around. Can you find your way through all the mazes and find the secret items scattered throughout?

name: Medusa
summary: A Metroidvania about Medusa searching for a foregone creature called the Ancient Sludge. Explore eight unique regions, face hordes of menacing enemies and acquire items to help you on your adventure.

summary:
It's Christmas time in 20XX, and one humbug is trying to stop Megaman and his friends from enjoying themselves!
Can you stop this Mysterious Villian and save Christmas from the deadly Robotic Reincarnations of Dicken's ghostly fiends?

name: Mega Man 3: The Robots are Revolting
summary: Mega Man 3: The Robots are Revolting is a game in the original Mega Man series licensed by Capcom USA and developed and published by Hi-Tech Expressions in association with Rozner Labs In 1992 for DOS. It is a sequel to the first Mega Man for DOS, with no Mega Man 2 for DOS in between.

name: Merely A Chip
summary: You're Nelson, Perhaps waking up in the middle of the night is common, but not for Nelson. He's hungry and wants to eat something, but when he checks the kitchen, he can't find anything. He decides to buy some chips in the supermarket and head back home.

name: Metal Slug Triple Pack
summary: Experience a collection run & gun shoot 'em up classics that have withstood the test of time with the Metal Slug Triple Pack!

name: Medieval Masters Collection
summary:
This compilation pack comes in an oversized box and contains three games:

- Age of Wonders
- Darkstone
- Tzar: The burden of the Crown

name: Medal of Honor: Vanguard
summary:
Players take on the role of Sgt. Frank Keegan, a member of the 82nd Airborne Division, and 17th Airborne Division fighting the Axis forces of Nazi Germany and the Kingdom of Italy.

The first mission, which is Operation Husky places Keegan in a C-47 aircraft somewhere off the coast of Sicily Suddenly, the plane explodes, and Keegan is thrown out. He manages to deploy his parachute and make it to the ground, where he fights through a town against Italian forces. Once through the town, they make their way around the coast to a bunker somewhere in Sicily, and shoot their way in, defeating the German forces inside. For this level, you are armed with a Thompson submachine gun, you may pick up weapons such as the MP40 and the M1 Garand rifle.

name: Memoria VR
summary: Memoria utilizes virtual reality to immerse healthy individuals in the experience of dementia symptoms, aiming to foster empathy and awareness regarding the challenges faced by people living with dementia.

name: Merge Magic!
summary:
A brand new game from the creators of the highly acclaimed Merge Dragons! -Discover enchanted tales and quests in the mysterious world of Merge Magic! where you can combine everything into better and more powerful items for your journey. 
 
Merge eggs to hatch magical creatures, then evolve them to uncover more powerful ones! Encounter and solve challenging puzzle levels: match the items to win, then bring rewards back to your Garden to collect and grow. 
 
The only hope to lift the curse from the bewitched land rests in YOUR extraordinary power to MERGE ANYTHING -- eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

name: Metapilot
summary: Designed with top experts from Boeing, the UK Government and several EVTOL companies, Metapilot gives you the real EVTOL flight experience! Fly your aircraft around the city, pick up guests from skyscrapers on time and don't run out of fuel! Bring the future one step closer by playing Metapilot now.

name: Medium: The Psychic Party Game
summary: In the game Medium, players act as psychic mediums, harnessing their powerful extra-sensory abilities to access other players’ thoughts. Together in pairs, they mentally determine the Medium: the word that connects the words on their two cards, and then attempt to say the same word at the same time!

name: Mega Drive 4
summary:
The Mega Drive 4, also branded as the Mega Drive 4 Guitar Idol, is a Mega Drive "console on a chip" which was released by Brazilian company Tectoy in October 2009 as a follow-up to the Mega Drive 3. The first version had 87 built-in games, some of which are not Mega Drive titles specifically, and does not have a cartridge slot for playing other games. It also comes with two control pads which attach to the console via two DE-9 ports, as they would in a traditional Mega Drive, plus a guitar accessory for playing the Guitar Idol game, which is overtly based upon the Guitar Hero games.

The game Pense Bem is said to count as 10 games in the general counting.

name: Mega Man RPG: Prototype
summary: Mega Man RPG Prototype is a browser-based fangame where you square off against hordes of increasingly challenging robot masters in turn-based battles, paying tribute to the battle systems of retro role-playing games released in the late 80s and early 90s. Prototype merges the combat and collection mechanics of the Pokémon series with the beloved characters and special weapons of the classic Mega Man series to create something familiar yet unexplored. The story unfolds in the original series timeline and features elements from across those games, but Battle Network fans may also recognize a familiar face or two. With three distinct campaigns, more than a hundred playable characters, and an ever-expanding array of unique abilities, there's a wealth of discovery awaiting in The Prototype.

name: Mercenary Tactics
summary: Command a squad of mercenaries to battle monstrous foes across five stages. Start small, strategically deploy and upgrade your team using earned resources. Build an unstoppable force and prove your tactical skills by surviving the onslaught and securing victory.

name: Mega Man X Online: Deathmatch
summary:
Mega Man X Online: Deathmatch is a Mega Man X Multiplayer Fan Game.

Ever wonder what would happen if you could use all the crazy weapons and abilities from Mega Man X games directly against other players? Find out in this action-packed online experience! Battle against other fellow Reploids for the most kills in multiplayer matches on the internet, or locally with AI opponents.

name: Megadungeon
summary: A fast paced, turn based dungeon crawler.

name: Memory Kara
summary: Memory Kara is a game for training memory and reaction. Memorize paired cards and have time to open everything in a certain time.

name: Megopoly
summary: Megopoly is the world’s first free-to-play board game where players build real estate empires. We’re currently in open beta and new features are released all the time so make sure to stake your claim now!

name: Mega Games 2
summary: Mega Games 2 is a compilation released for the Sega Mega Drive only in Europe in 1993. It was the second of three similar compilations, and was only distributed with Sega Mega Drive II consoles.

name: Mech Rage
summary: The aliens are coming! The life of your crew is in your hands. Can you defend your ship from the pesky invaders?

name: Meat Factory
summary: Single player level done in the industrial style of E3M5 or BB3

name: Metal Jacket
summary: Metal Jacket is a First Person Shooter/Simulation video game developed by Pony Canyon and published by Solan in September 1995.

name: Memory of Torenia
summary: Memory of Torenia is a warm and healing visual novel.In the spring of the second semester of Senior two, Zou Jin met her new classmate named Zhuge Xia and they became deskmates. Completely different in personality, they should have been strangers to each other.

name: Merchant's Odyssey
summary: Step into the shoes of a young merchant on a journey where you'll trade goods, recruit a diverse array of mercenaries, engage in tactical combat, and make critical decisions that shape both your path and the unfolding story.

name: Meteorites
summary:
Meteorites is an arcade action game featuring gameplay similar to Asteroids. You control a spaceship surrounded by numerous asteroids; your goal is to destroy them! Each time you shoot an asteroid, it will break up into smaller asteroids. Eventually the pieces will be small enough that you can destroy them. When you have destroyed all of the asteroids, you will move on to the next, more difficult level. 
 
Meteorites was originally called Disasteroids, but the name was changed under pressure from Atari.

name: Merchant's Game
summary: Merchant's Game is a 2D pixelart open-ended game that you hire npc's, negotiate prices, sell and buy items to pay your debt to the lanlord and maintaining your shop.

name: Memorize Cards
summary: This is a little game in the genre of paired images for memory.

name: Meet the Rookie
summary: Explore the small town of Kettle Rock as Detective Lupe, alongside their unlikely partner Sheriff Misra, to solve the case of a mysterious Winery. But things are not as they seem, as something much more sinister lies behind the history of this town.

name: Menagerie I: Exoptable Money
summary: Once, on a quiet sunday evening, you found a magical box that makes money. You take it home and decide to get richer and richer, with no end in sight. But you are not the only one who enjoys having money...

name: Metal Fury 3000
summary: Metal Fury 3000 will mix furious shootings, brutal fights, awesome pixel art, real physics, destructible environments, dismembering enemies, a lot of secrets to find, absurdly devastating weapons to use, an amazing Heavy Metal soundtrack (that will split your eardrums) and much more.

name: Metal Brigade Tactics
summary: Metal Brigade Tactics is a turn-based tactical strategy game with deep RPG elements. Control your squad of Vertical Armor giant robots on a mission to stop a small country from embroiling the world in a devastating war.

name: Mezmeratu
summary: A Platform-Hell adventure but with some ROGUE stuff! Discover a new world from the creator of Baobabs Mausoleum, full of surrealistic horror villages, stinky talking characters, impossible rogue platforms and... and a giant fish kidnapped inside an owl's beak. Welcome to Prosciutto Misa!

name: Mesel
summary: Mesel is inviting you to become the protagonist and the writer of a novel at the same time. Create your own novel with your own decisions.

name: Mendum Memoria
summary: A Yume Nikki Fangame about a boy who hides something in his dream world.

name: Mermaid Story
summary: Mermaid Story is a fun puzzle game designed for kids as young as 2 years old! Higher levels of puzzle difficulties provide even more fun and challenges for children of all ages.

name: Meteorder
summary: Meteors are falling from the sky. Eliminate them by aligning same-colored blocks and launching them upward.

name: Mega Games 3
summary: The final release of the Mega Games series of compilation cartridges.

name: Metal Masters
summary: Metal Masters is an Amiga beat'em up arcade game released in 1991 by Infogrames.

name: Meikyuu Machi no Grace
summary: Grace, a powerful swordsman with huge debts, joined the labyrinth exploration in order to solve the problem of money, and unavoidably helped men with sex-related services. A degenerate roguelike game where men get married and have children!

name: Melkhior's Mansion
summary: A retro style tribute to the great 8-bit isometric games of the 1980's, set in a beautiful pixel art castle.

name: Metal Exile
summary: Leap, grapple, and blast your way through monsters and hazards in this retro 2D action-platformer. Explore, buy upgrades, and equip different suits and weapons to survive a variety of hazards and ultimately escape from Exile.

name: Metal March
summary: Metal March is a newly fashioned turn-based strategy simulation game that combines chess strategy with CCG. Create a force that fits your strategy & inclinations and generate synergies by using cards and relics in order to complete your expedition successfully. March your metals to the end!

name: Meteor Commander
summary: Retro-inspired arcade-style shooter. Save humanity from incoming waves of flaming hot meteors, alien ships hell-bent on destroying humanity, and the strangeness of space by shooting, blasting and nuking incoming waves of meteors and enemies.

name: Merely a Regret
summary: Love found amidst the brambles of failure

name: Metasweeper
summary: Explore a strange rectilinear land full of strange rectilinear life. Find new abilities that unlock new areas and complement your clearing and flagging. And discover more depth than you ever thought possible from a game based on minesweeper.

name: Megatris: Arcade Edition
summary: A mod of the Uzebox port of Tetris, made for the RetroAchievements community.

name: Melli's Retro Land
summary: A platformer for the Uzebox.

name: Menateus
summary: Menateus is the official commercial game for the Expo in Hannover, Germany. The game centers around the EXPO 2000 Exhibition, where you have to stop the fog of indifference to save the planet. In doing this, you must travel through time and space. You have to visit the Cyberdome, the palace of elements, the pyramids of mystic. Only if you find all puzzle pieces, you can finish this game.

name: Medabots: Metabee & Rokusho
summary: Kids are losing their prized Medabot medals and Medaparts to a diabolical team of evil Medamaniacs!

name: Medieval Playground
summary:
Explore-Dig-Build-Play that's what you can do in Medieval Playground. Four types of terrain for your playground. Place and edit trees, animals, people and buildings to your liking. Make battles with allies and enemies and choose your side. Create underground caves and decorate them.
It's a medieval sandbox where you can create without limits. Enjoy have fun with it.

name: Mercenary Battlegrounds
summary: Mercenary Battlegrounds is an autobattler in the tower defense genre, in which players have to defend their base from waves of monsters and enemy mercenaries. The game takes place in the fantastic galaxy Outcast, which was formed as a result of a unique phenomenon - the conjugation of galaxies.

name: Medieval Battle Simulator
summary: "Medieval Battle Simulator" is an indie game that will allow you to simulate battles set in a military era with simple gameplay.

name: Mecha Ritz: Steel Rondo 2.0
summary: An expanded version of Doujin shooting game Mecha Ritz, featuring new ships, adjusted game balance, new story content and various other adjustments.

name: Meat Veterans
summary: Check out a free-to-play online action game! Test your shooting abilities in individual and team battles against your opponent. Stand out by creating your own strategy and distinctive style with unique skins and items, and especially - by taking the top place in the global ranking.

name: Memories of War: Undead Decimation
summary: Memories of War: Undead Decimation is a fast paced third person shooter. Save the world single handedly or with a 4 player squad. Journey through different landscapes as you take on the undead. Can you defeat the undead?

name: Megalonia
summary: You will be able to participate in a real space adventure in this game. Manage the spacecraft with your cursor and shoot down enemy ships and asteroids by clicking. Here you will not be allowed to relax.

name: Meridian
summary: MERIDIAN is a wellness VR journey through your body, exploring its properties and limitations. Develop new control and sensation. You follow, learn about yourself, learn how to breathe, and embrace the struggle. Then you get better. Then you repeat.

name: Mech vs. Bugs
summary: In Mech vs Bugs, you'll pilot a mech to fend off alien insects on remote planets. Combining intense top-down combat with strategic looting and crafting, your goal is to liberate the galaxy, one insect-infested planet at a time. Ready for your thrilling, third-person adventure?

name: Mechanic Battle
summary: Pimp up your ride and snatch the title of the best car mechanic during the Mechanic Battle Tournament!

name: MegaAri
summary: MegaAri is a 2d plaftorm, doujin game based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Meanwhile in Sector 80
summary: As an engineer stranded in an alien star system, scavenge parts and build equipment to fight your way back home. Work with (or against) the laws of physics in Meanwhile in Sector 80 to turn trash into survival.

name: Menma's TERA
summary: Menma's TERA is an unofficial fork of the popular 2011 MMORPG game TERA, brought to you by the players.

name: Mega Museum
summary: Explore the world, uncover rare artifacts and build the Museum of your dreams in this incremental, curation game

name: Meowoof
summary: Meowoof is a quirky 2D action game with just one button.

name: Metal Fight Beyblade DS
summary: Metal Fight Beyblade is a Beypoint Reader.

name: Meadows Lanes
summary: A black and white bowling game from Meadows Games.

name: Mercenary Warriors
summary: Mercenary Warriors is a Turn Based PVP Strategy Game set in a fantasy world. Create your own team selecting 9 of the multiple warriors available to you and rise to the top.

name: Meat Jam
summary: A community map jam for Quake 1, where participants had a month to create a level focusing on meat. This pack contains 12 maps, including the start map. Runs on the Quoth mod, which is included, and adds new enemies, weapons, and powerups.

name: Mentari
summary: In a world frozen by The Stillness, one girl holds the power to undo the damage. Mentari is an action-adventure game where you take control of the titular heroine to make the world move again, through a unique, dance-based combat system.

name: Men Bang
summary: It’s time to let your imagination run wild with the steamiest Dating Sim/ Clicker on this side of town! With scenarios so mouth-watering, a wide variety of unique hunks, and a fantastic retro artwork and atmosphere, Men Bang has everything you need to fulfill your deepest and wildest desires!

name: Memo Blox
summary: Memo Blox is a casual game that challenges your attention and memory. The game features a good minimalistic style and great music. Can you become a Master of Memo Blox?

name: Mega Force
summary:
In the game, the player pilots a starship called the Final Star, while shooting various enemies and destroying enemy structures for points.

Unlike later vertical scrolling shooters, like Toaplan's Twin Cobra, the Final Star had only two levels of weapon power, and no secondary weapons like missiles and/or bombs. Each stage in the game was named after a letter of the Greek alphabet. In certain versions of the game, there is an additional level called "Infinity" (represented by the infinity symbol) which occurs after Omega, after which the game repeats indefinitely.

name: Medicevil
summary: Can a cure be found for the plague, or can humanity live with it? Even if found, should there be a price, and if so, who should pay it? On the road to tomorrow, are those bringing healing the friends I should join hands with, or are they rivals for a future I can hold in my hands?

name: Meta
summary:
A parody of amateur adventure design, this metagame consists of a simple treasure hunting game, and a complex editor needed to complete it. The editor and its assistant Cuppit are all part of the game; anyone involved in game or level design should appreciate the humor.

The editor is an exercise of twisted logic and lateral thinking. You have to see it to believe it; with its offbeat controls, inventory items that kill you, and intentional misspellings, it's the weirdest thing since sliced bread!

META is based on Adventure Game Studio, the platform for most of our games, and is runner-up for two AGS Awards.

name: Metal Factions
summary:
Far into the future, different factions fight throughout the galaxy for control of resources using armies of advanced machines... 
 
Metal Factions is a FREE 3D real time strategy game that runs on the Spring RTS engine. 
 
It's an evolving game that currently features four factions: AVEN, GEAR, CLAW and SPHERE.

name: Mega Man: Square Root of Negative One
summary: Mega Man Square Root of Negative One is a fan game created by Theimaginarymegaman (also known as snow runt pyro.)

name: >Meow
summary:
Play as a robot catgirl named K0tya who is trying to help her Master locate the missing lab rats (ignore the fact that said Master's forgetfulness is the reason they are missing in the first place).

Explore the research facility that you live in and find those missing critters before the morning shift starts, or your Master gets in trouble.

name: Metal Black: S-Tribute
summary: Metal Black S-Tribute is port of Metal Black, a 2D a side-scrolling shooter arcade game by TAITO in 1991. This game is a reproduction of the home console version released by Ving in 1996. Play with improved controls and new features.

name: MetaTron
summary: As TRON we send you on a journey to learn survival skills, to develop mutations, to build fortifications and to hunt other TRON mercenaries on the map. You're playing a PvP survival - with a versatile construction mode - where you can switch back and forth between firearms and your melee mutations. Be TRON!

name: Metamor Jupiter
summary: Sci-fi shoot 'em up featuring music from Masaya Matsuura, famous for Parappa the Rapper.

name: Melting Point
summary: Melting Point is an action puzzle game for all ages. How to Play: Run your Fire Sprite through the many puzzle levels and clear out as much Ice as you can, while keeping an eye on your health, for each Ice Block will cost you one unit of health, while Blue Ice will cost you two.

name: Medieval Conquest
summary: Welcome to the world of medieval battles and heroic deeds! In this game you will go on an exciting journey through the era of knightly tournaments and great battles.

name: Medical Diagnostic Simulator
summary: Play as a general practitioner in this text-based medical simulation game. Consult, examine, and diagnose your patients in your own medical practice.

name: Mechanical Sunset
summary: A catastrophe is looming on the horizon -- threatening the existence of the Walking City of Machines, home to thousands of robots. You are its last hope, and the only solution is through machinery.

name: Mega Man 2
summary: Homebrew version of Mega Man 2 for TurboGrafx 16/PC Engine

name: Merry Bear
summary: A charming 2D platformer where you traverse through themed lands of giant fruit, TV dinners, spooky dollhouses, and your cozy, new A-frame cabin. Help Merry Bear find her mascot neighbors (and maybe some chic furniture) in a delightful, hand-drawn world influenced by mid-century illustration.

name: Mega Blast
summary: A Bomberman style 2D action game.

name: Medieval Remembrance
summary: Fight for Christendom and defeat the Romuva pagans of Old Prussia and their Necromantic ways.

name: Mega Man X Dive
summary:
The latest chapter in the classic action shooting game, "Mega Man X!"
Play as the legendary irregular hunters X and Zero,
and take on the internet world known as the "Deep Log."

name: Medarot Classics Plus Kabuto Version
summary:
Medarot Classics Plus collects together eight different games in the Medarot (aka Medabots) series. This edition includes all five of the Game Boy and Game Boy Color games from the 3DS compilation and adds three extra Game Boy Advance games. All of the original games in this compilation were originally released in two different versions; this compilation features the Kabuto Version variants of each included game. The included games are:
- Medarot
- Medarot 2
- Medarot 3
- Medarot 4
- Medarot 5: Susutake Mura no Tenkousei
- Medarot Navi
- Medarot G
- Medarot Two: CORE

name: Meitantei Holmes: Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken
summary:
An adventure game starring Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's Sherlock Holmes developed for the NES by Towa Chiki.

Meitantei Holmes: Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken ("Great Detective Holmes: Fog of London Murder Case") is a murder mystery adventure game where the player directs Sherlock Holmes around London, finding clues and interrogating witnesses and suspects. Like its many NES adventure game contemporaries, it adheres to the Portopia formula of text adventure whodunits.

It is the sequel to Towa Chiki's earlier Sherlock Holmes game (Sherlock Holmes: Hakushaku Reijou Yuukai Jiken) and received a sequel (Meitantei Holmes: M-Kara no Chousenjou). None of these games were ever released outside of Japan.

name: Mega Minis: Volume 2
summary: A second disc of PSP Minis collected together.

name: Mech Survivor Elite
summary: Mech Survivor Elite is a time-based survival game featuring action-packed gameplay and roguelite elements.

name: Mech Anarchy
summary: Mech Anarchy is an action packed, fast-paced top down shooter created by intense gamers, for intense gamers. Arcade style shooting with near limitless customization makes no two battles alike.

name: Mesonoxian
summary: Mesonoxian is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Tyran. Tyran is stuck inside his home due to a rainstorm, leaving him to daydream in his free time. The main goal is to explore and collect effects (known as Influences). A minigame can be played on the console in the room outside the bedroom.

name: Meet Cute: Delivery
summary: Thanks for your order! The package will soon be delievered to you by our cutest delivery girl. Be gentle with her, and we might give you a discount for your next order!

name: Meguru Dungeon
summary: A roguelike RPG in which you explore a randomly generated 3D dungeon, collecting items and aiming for the goal of each level. You are free to choose your character's name, looks, stats, etc. Use more than 50 skills and over 200 items to completely conquer the 10 layers of the Lost Forest.

name: Member of War
summary: Member of War Multi-player War Simulator.

name: Merendam: Escape from Seram isle
summary: Horror action adventure for mobiles

name: Merge Towers
summary: Your castle is under attack!!! Buy, merge and arrange your towers to defend against waves of bloodthirsty enemies. Give your towers super powers by adding ice, fire, lightning, poison runes and many more!

name: Merchant Legends: The Founding
summary: Build a new town in a vibrant retro fantasy world... Gather resources, recruit citizens, trade goods and grow your empire to push back the forces of evil!

name: Metal Slug Advance
summary: An unauthorized adaption of the Game Boy Advance version of Metal Slug.

name: Metamorfose S
summary: Metamorfose S is a 2D action-adventure game with RPG elements.

name: Meldev Power Boat Racing
summary: Real ocean physics. Power Boat Racing at its edge for PC.

name: Mega-Bucks
summary: A puzzle-platforming game releasing on Firebird's budget brand Silverbird in1986/87 for the Amstrad CPC and ZX Spectrum.

name: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible II - Hajimari no Fukuin
summary: Boy, be the light that illuminates the world. The gospel of the beginning rings out in the land covered with despair.

name: Metal Glove: Exodus
summary: Metal Glove: Exodus is a top-down dungeon crawler inspired by the classics. Hack and slash your way through the dungeon on your journey to defeat the evil Rock Troll within!

name: Metal Survivor
summary: A base-building action-roguelite horde-survival game. Build up your base and defend it with a customized armored vehicle. Set-up defenses, upgrade your weapons, improve your vehicle and be ready to shoot down an ever growing horde of enemies to survive each night.

name: Metroid Dread GBC Demake
summary: A demake of the introduction of Metroid Dread for the Game Boy Color. A demo (v1) was released, but the author stopped working on it due to copyright.

name: Merciless Podium
summary: Merciless Podium is a colorful catch and match game, with a challenging spin on a classic match 3 titles. Play your way through hundreds of levels, use special Yushes, save as much of these innocent beings as you can! With dozens and dozens of special cubes and Yushes, movement types, addictive and challenging levels, the fun never ends.

name: Metal Saga: Hagane no Kisetsu
summary:
Metal Saga: Hagane no Kisetsu (Japanese: メタルサーガ ～鋼の季節～, literally Metal Saga: Season of Steel) is a post-apocalyptic role-playing video game developed by Crea-Tech and published by Success in 2006. It running in Nintendo DS and it is a full touch screen controlled game.

Metal Saga: Hagane no Kisetsu is the fifth game of Metal Max series. Unlike its predecessor Metal Saga, the game wasn't released in North America. And in 2007, a sequel was released on mobile phone as an incarnation of Metal Saga and was released in Japan in 2007.

This entry is very different with original games. For example, multiple characters sit in only a tank instead of one person sit in one, and using "durability" instead of tank's armor.

name: Melody Mania
summary: Let your talent shine when you sing along your favorite songs in this fun party game! A variety of modes let you play with friends or compete against them. An open song format and integrated editor provide boundless possibilites.

name: Metaplace
summary: Metaplace was at the time, a "next-generation" virtual worlds platform and game designed to work the way the Web does; lead by game industry veterans Raph Koster and John Donham.

name: Mech Wars
summary: Long ago, the Stenian race lived in harmony on the planet Xelarvis, aided by their mechas. However, everything changed when the Kaxeder race arrived. They invaded the world with the intent to destroy and conquer it.

name: Men in Black: The Series
summary: The scum of the universe continue to slip through the cracks in the system and arrive on earth. As a Men in Black agent, it's your job to stop them. Armed with advanced weapons including the noisy cricket, freezer gun, and grenade launcher, you will battle an array of aliens across New York, and even in space.

name: Megaman RPG
summary: First, you get to battle the original six robots from mega man in any order. You then win their moves to use in battle. After the six robots; Bomb Man, Guts Man, Cut Man, Elec Man, Ice Man, and Fire Man have been destroyed, take on the Evil Dr. Wily at his Castle where many perilous fights await . . .

name: Metroid Prime: Blast Ball
summary:
Blast Ball is a multiplayer mode and in-universe sport game that appear in Metroid Prime: Federation Force.
Blast Ball can be played alone or against local or online players. Players who do not possess a copy of Federation Force will be able to play this mode through Nintendo 3DS Download Play.

The game mode has been released as a standalone title, Metroid Prime: Blast Ball, in the Nintendo eShop as a free downloadable demo in both the European and American storefronts.

name: Memopoly
summary:
It’s time to use your memory ability to find a way to solve the puzzle.
The rule is easy, just tap on the colors of the right-side 3D object and focus on the place of that color in the left-side pattern. You will need your concentration and memory to recognize the right place of each color. Then you should tap the colors one by one respectively and quickly.
Actually, It’s you that create the 3D object step by step by solving each pattern.

name: Mesih
summary:
Can you convince the whole world?

A new belief has emerged, and you have been chosen to spread it. Humanity will always have reasons to hate you, so you must use your words, miracles, and improvements to make your religion believed worldwide. You should talk to people without earning their hatred, travel through cities, and correct mistakes with your miracles.

In your journey starting from Egypt, Jerusalem, or Rome, you will encounter hundreds of stories and people. While trying to spread your belief worldwide, you will reach one of twenty different endings.

Throughout your adventure, you can develop yourself to reach more believers, perform miracles, and create disasters to enhance your religion.

As the effects of your words create chaos in the world, you must create a religion that all of humanity believes in by dealing with people's hatred, lies, kings, and demons.

name: Mega Man Battle & Fighters
summary: Mega Man Battle & Fighters features two titles arranged for the NeoGeo Pocket Color: Mega Man: The Power Batlte and MEga Man 2: The Power Fighters.

name: Metal.ik Vol. II
summary:
Ik a soul liberated full of hatred penetrates the depths of Internet to Play a cassette, because music is the only human vestige that remains.

FPS Steampunk like a Quake + Hotline Miami

name: Memento Mori
summary: A well made, pretty huge and nicely balanced medieval level. Somewhat confusing from time to time though.

name: Meditation Journey: VR Zen Garden
summary: This Virtual Reality experience will take you into a beautiful garden, where you will learn about meditation and how to meditate anywhere you are in life.

name: Metal Banana
summary: The forest was invaded by an army of robots! Use your skill to help Monkee, Donkee, Tinkee and Pinkee save the day. Metal Banana brings classic elements of arcade games in a new title full of action and colors.

name: Merchant Isle
summary: Ship wrecked on an island, establish your merchant empire from the ground up. Buy and sell items, negotiate prices, invest in businesses, and establish trade routes. Explore ancient ruins for high worth relics. Claw your way up to the top of the merchant guild!

name: Memories Off 2nd
summary: The 2001 sequel to Memories Off continues the interactive romance visual novel saga.

name: Metroid + Saving
summary:
This hack replaces Metroid’s password system with a saving system, offering three save files. The file selection menu shows the player’s equipment, and as an added bonus, the player’s health is now saved (no need to grind for health every time you resume your game). The save system can be a handy addition for those who don’t like to use save-states, or those playing on a flash-cart.

Included is a scrollable map when the game is paused and the ability to combine wave and ice beams.

Version 0.3 fixes a bug that could prevent the game from booting correctly in some cases. The hack has been tested and confirmed to work on the PowerPak as well as a normal cart.

name: Mega Man Rock Force
summary: It was the year 20XX and Earth had finally achieved an extended period of peace. Wily had since vanished, permitting the world to once again focus on other matters: science, progress, and the ever growing relationship between humans and robots. However, Mega Man, now wary of true everlasting piece, recruited eight willing robot masters and began training them; if evil should dare arise, his team, the Rock Force, would be there to stop it.

name: Medieval: Total War - Battle Collection
summary: Medieval: Total War Battle Collection, an all-new compilation of the Creative Assembly's critically acclaimed Medieval: Total War and the expansion pack Medieval: Total War Viking Invasion.

name: Memories Off 6: Next Relation
summary: Just before summer holiday, Shio lives a busy school life as captain of the student council with a support of Yuno, who is in charge of general affairs of the council. He sometimes vaguely thinks what he will do after graduating from high school.... There is an important girl by his side.

name: Medal of Legends
summary: You vs Zombies vs Gangs.Your duty is to lead the battle, save the world and become the best shooter and sniper.

name: Merge Your Room: Extended Edition
summary:
After a day of fun and games with friends and family, it's time to clean it all up! Find pairs of items scattered around the apartment and merge them, putting them in their places. Every day there are more toys, so finding them becomes even more difficult! Will you manage to collect more of them than your friends?

Includes Toys Pack.

name: Megumi Rescue
summary: Megumi Rescue lets you control a rescue party of three to save people from a burning building. The group consists of two people holding a jumping sheet, and a third fire fighter bouncing on the sheet to reach the building's inhabitants at the windows.

name: Merc Storia: Ijutsushi to Kane no Neiro
Mega Man Eternal
summary: Mega Man Eternal is a fan game made by Daniel Page. In the year 20XX, the world was at peace for the time being, all thanks to Mega Man putting an end to Dr. Wily's schemes once more. During this time, Dr. Light had developed a new prototype technology to enhance Mega Man's memory and copy abilities called the "Mega Data". He intends to use the data to bring back all his previous creations to destroy Mega Man and take over the world. Using the Mega Data, Dr. Wily even created eight original Robot Masters as a part of his new Mega Data Number (MDN) series. Now it is up to Mega Man to stop him, save Rush, and put to stop to Wily's evil scheme again.

name: Memories Off After Rain
summary: A three volume set of epilogue stories featuring characters from Memories Off and 2nd.

name: MechWarrior: Tactical Command
summary: A Mechwarrior game by Smith & Tinker and Personae Studios. Developed for iOS devices.

name: Mercury Meltdown Remix
summary: The goo has gotten onto your big-screen TV with this remixed version of the popular PSP puzzler now on PS2. Mercury Meltdown is a brain-teasing puzzle game that challenges players to immerse themselves in a colorful world of sci-fi machines, crazy characters and bubbling test tubes. Players take control of a liquid mercury 'blob', guiding it around traps, door switches, spikes, moving floors and other hazardous elements in order to complete the level. This remix features over 200 thought provoking levels, including two never-before seen Labs.

name: Metrash
summary: A top-down-shooter Metroid-like.

name: Mechenosets
summary: A game based on the movie “Меченосец” ("The Sword Bearer"). This is a drama about how society makes a monster out of a human being, about love and hate, capable of turning fragile flesh into steel. In the role of the main character of the movie you will have to go through all the iconic locations of the movie and fight with numerous opponents. The game repeats and in a way complements the plot of the movie, turning the combination of game and movie into a unique experience for the player and the viewer.

name: Metamode
summary:
"Metamode" is an action role-playing game for the Game Boy Color released by Koei in 2000.
The goal is to maintain world peace by having the protagonist join the "Keibi-tai" and use a tool called "Metamode" to transform into various jobs.

name: Mercs Fully Loaded
summary: Mercs Fully Loaded is a TPS (Third Person Shooter) RPG. Start your career at Mercs-HQ as their newest recruit, help citizens of Mercs-HQ rebuild the city, play mini-games or hunt for collectibles in your spare time.

name: Megaton Musashi W: V Navigator "Korone Inugami"
Mega Fast Food
summary: Build and manage your own fast food store. Decide how your store will look like, hire the best staff, manage inventory, offer drive-thru, create your own custom food menu. Become the best and most popular fast food store in town!

name: Memento Mori II
summary: Memento Mori II (MM2.WAD) is a 1996 megawad that contains 32 new levels, plus two top-secret levels that are not contained in the WAD file itself (see Accessing the top-secret levels). Released on July 27, 1996, it is the sequel to the 1995 megawad Memento Mori, with many of the same designers involved, including Denis and Thomas Möller of the Innocent Crew. Like its predecessor, and in contrast to most megawads, it is designed especially for cooperative multiplayer gameplay, although it can be played in single-player as well. It is also one of the few PWADs that are allowed to be used in Compet-N speedruns.

name: Medarot 3 Kabuto Version
summary:
Medarot 3 was released in 2000 for the Game Boy Color. It was released in two versions: Kabuto and Kuwagata.

The game follows Ikki Tenryou and his friends in the town of Omikuji. After Ikki robottles with the Screws, everyone's Medarotch data is suddenly deleted by an unknown figure.

Medarot 3 introduced various new gameplay aspects, including Medachange and Medalias.

name: Memorial Series: Sunsoft vol. 3
summary: Memorial Series: Sunsoft Vol. 3 is a compilation featuring Kanshakudama Nage Kantarou no Toukaidou Gojuusan-tsugi and The Wing of Madoola.

name: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible
summary: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible New Testament is a spin off Megami Tensei title for Legacy Mobile devices.

name: MechWarrior 2: The Titanium Trilogy
summary: The Titanium Trilogy is the re-release of all MechWarrior 2 games for Windows 95, rebalanced and fully textured.

name: Medieval Fantasy: Jigsaw Puzzle - Emperor Edition
Mega Blaster
summary: Use the right force on the TNT plunger to aim for the blocks and demolish the tower.

name: Mercenaries of War
summary: Welcome to Mercenaries of War, an online hardcore PvP survival game with permanent death.Keep yourself protected by buying weapons and stocking up on bullets. If you die, your character is permanently dead and you will have to start over fresh.

name: Metaltech: Earthsiege - Expansion Pack
summary: An expansion pack for the original Metaltech: Earthsiege.

name: Mega Man Dongs
summary:
Mega Man Dongs is a fan-game with two main characteristics: parody and difficulty.
The authors are Robot Goat and Dectilion.

name: Memento Infernum
summary: You are unpure, and you have to fulfill God's plan in Memento Infernum, tight top-down shooter where you have to face hordes of demons.

name: Memory Card Monsters: Expanded Content 3
summary: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Memory Card Monsters: Expanded Content 4
summary: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Memorize
summary: A game of memorizing the path, resetting every time you make a mistake. 50 Moves, can you memorize?

name: Memory Card Monsters: Expanded Content 6
summary: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Mechanic Heroes
summary: Build your team of mechanics and work together to repair and deliver as many cars as possible before the time runs out! Playable with up to 4 players, locally or online, Mechanic Heroes will make you love mechanic or simply hate your friends.

name: Megacity Builder
summary: A city builder that has all the bells and whistles you know and love with one twist. In Megacity Builder you build a whole nation not just a city. Pass laws at the national level. Fiddle with the budgets at the city level. Build cities like in classic city builders while producing resources to feed your massive capital. Massive game world to keep you busy building for many hours.

name: Memory Wonderland: Bond
summary: This game is a maze exploration RPG that combines features such as strategic combat, puzzle-solving adventure, collectibles, and emotional storylines to provide an engaging gaming experience with beautiful scenery.

name: Mega Man X2: Proto Edition
summary: Like the previous title, this sequel puts the player in control of Protoman from the classic series.

name: Mewnition
summary: A co-op adventure game for 1-16 players, set in a voxel environment teeming with gargantuan beasts and powerful artifacts. Forage for resources, fortify your arenas, and fight fearsome foes as you reshape the world and uncover the truth of how it came to be.

name: Menos: Psi-Shatter
summary: A High-impact Action Shooter with a Telekinetic protagonist. Throw enemies and pick up weapons with your mind while battling through the depths of Site Echo, a research facility losing control of a world consuming force.

name: Medieval Idle: Quest
summary: Medieval Idle: Quest is a captivating game that will transport you back to the middle ages. This idle game combines the elements of simulation and strategy to create a truly engaging experience for gamers of all ages.

name: Mega Apocalypse
summary: It is the sequel to Crazy Comets. The game involves repetitively shooting planets and moons as they grow in size and threaten to collide with the player's space ship. The game is noted for its Rob Hubbard music, fast paced action and 2 player co-op game play.

name: Memory Novel: The Threesome
summary: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing a small sex story in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match, Flip two cards, and if the words on them match, they will be removed from the board, revealing a unique image from threesome sex adventures in a fancy loft.

name: Memory Puzzle: Sexy Fairies
summary: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing sexy fairies hidden under magic symbols which you have to match.

name: Metal Dogs EX Quest01: Here Comes the Metal Enemies
summary: This is a DLC where you can play quests featuring additional monsters from the shooting action game "METAL DOGS".

name: Metal Tales: Fury of the Guitar Gods
summary: Metal Tales: Fury of the Guitar Gods mixes Metal with pure adrenaline, to deliver the ultimate 3D roguelike shooter.

name: MeowFall
summary: MeowFall is a charming 2D platformer in pixel art style. Take control of an adorable cat, overcome obstacles and uncover the secrets. Are you ready for an adventure to find the best hat ever?

name: Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei! Vulcan Horuseus
summary: Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei Vulcan Horuseus is an Action game, developed by Amble and published by Takara Tomy, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Memories Off 6: T-wave
summary: A compilation of the two Memories Off 6 games.

name: Meteor Blasters
summary: Meteor Blasters is a non-stop action space shooter. Inspired by Asteroids, this game will see you choose between 6 different ships each with their own characteristics and utilize a variety of weapon powerups to eradicate the space rocks. Play 4 players Co-op or Versus Mode with friends.

name: Melty Blood: Type Lumina - DLC: Aoko Aozaki Round Announcements
Meadow: Blue Poison Dart Frog and Anteater Skin Pack
summary: Transform the look of your favourite animals in Meadow! This pack contains two skins: one Blue Spotted Frog skin for the Frog and one Anteater skin for the Elephant Calf.

name: Medieval Lords
summary: Forge your dynasty in a medieval world, where strategy, economy, and legacy intertwine.

name: Meteorite Z: The Apocalypse
summary: Hardcore top-down zombie shooter, one bite and you are a zombie, you will have allies, manage your team effectively. Use many types of weapons to suppress hordes of zombies. A colorful system for dismembering opponents.

name: Metal Max 2 Kai
summary: Metal Max 2 Kai is a Role-Playing game and Game Boy Advance version of Metal Max 2, developed and published by Now Production, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Meta Nanos: Rumble Race
summary: Meta Nanos: Rumble Race is an exciting and action-packed game where your Nanos race against other Nanos for the top spots in the weekly leaderboards. Win awesome prices and show your opponents that your Nanos are just faster.

name: Memory Card Monsters: Expanded Content 7
summary: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Mercenaries Saga
summary:
Originally released in 2007 and 2010 on Japanese mobile game platforms, au BREW(R) and later docomo, it was re-released in Japan for iOS and Android in 2017.

The game will be available outside of Japan for the first time as part of the Mercenaries Saga Chronicles bundle on the Nintendo Switch

name: Melanie and the Magic Forest
summary:
Melanie and the Magic Forest is a relaxing, no combat Game Boy adventure game filled with magic, quirky characters, and late 90's/early 2000’s references.

Explore the Magic Forest as Melanie and help your fellow residents. Grow some vegetables, make new friends, and most importantly - pet the dog!

name: Meowstro
summary: You are a cat with a piano and synthesizer made just for you! Meowstro is designed to be a versatile MIDI interface, allowing you to play using MIDI inputs and outputs. Humans can also interact with it using a standard PC keyboard.

name: Mega Man X6 Tweaks
summary: A compilation of tweaks for Mega Man X6, initially aiming only to remove the unnecessary padding and limitations the game uses to compensate for its shortcomings.

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Essential Hits Edition
summary: The Essential Hits Edition contains Metal: Hellsinger and the Essential Hits Pack. Metal: Hellsinger is the rhythm FPS bursting with demons, badass weapons, and powerful music. With the Essential Hits Pack, slay to eight additional hit songs from Muse, Depeche Mode, and Gorillaz, and more.

name: Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel
summary: Get Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel, Adventure game for PSP, PSVita console from the official PlayStation website.

name: Mew's Under The Truck
summary: Thoughts on gaming rumours of the past.

name: Mech Explorer
summary:
In a post-apocalyptic world, a mercenary explores the ruins of an underground city,
piloting her mech, in search of her missing partner.

name: Metal Gear Solid: Fight of the Metal Gears
summary: The legendary fanfiction written by squirrelking will be illustrated by brilliant graphics in widescreen 360p resolution and fully voiced cinematic sequences! Fight of the Metal Gears lets players be Jake Snake himself, the son of the legendary Solid Snake. After Solid Snake's tragic death, Jake receives an urgent call from Otacon who informs him of Metal Gears in Out Heaven. Jake Snake decides to continue his father's legacy of destroying Metal Gears and killing bad guys!

name: Metris 5
summary: magnussoft

name: Mercenaries of the Kingdom: First Blood
summary: Party-based rogue-lite RPG set in Earthial, a fantasy world. Hire various races of mercenaries, equip them, create battle formations, and grab the loot! Kill tens of thousands of enemies using steel and spells!

name: Merry's Errands
summary: Enjoy a peaceful day in the life of Merry the Rabbit. Explore the town, talk to your friends, finish your chores, and maybe give a gift to someone you like...?

name: Meine Liebe II: Hokori to Seigi to Ai
Meteor Mission
summary: A Lunar Rescue style game where you must drift down through floating asteroids, rescue six astronauts from the surface and return each to the safety of your mothership.

name: Medicopter 117 4
summary: PC game

name: Metroid: Ripped Worlds
summary: Metroid: Ripped Worlds is a fangame created by Scott Cawthon on August 28, 2005.

name: Menticide
summary: Menticide is a survival horror game that takes you through chilling investigations. As a special forces operative, you'll delve into routine missions that unravel into terrifying mysteries. Dark secrets await beneath the surface. Will you survive long enough to uncover the truth?

name: Mekanikko
summary: Mekanikko is an RPG that takes place in the world of modern steampunk. Explore the world of automatons, as weird things are always about to happen. Meet wacky characters with each of their own story tell. Solve cases with your sugar-freak partner, and find out the truth of this mechanical city.

name: Me llow
summary: Me llow is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. Your goal is to explore Nuitsuki's dreams and collect all the effects.

name: Meteos
summary: An evil planet named Meteo is sending storms of world-ending meteors across the galaxy, and only your puzzle skills can stop them. As blocks drop down on the lower screen, you must use the DS's stylus to match up blocks of the same color. Once you have enough blocks connected, they'll shoot back into the sky to form planets on the upper screen.

name: Mermaid Tail
summary: It's Mia's 18th birthday and just like every other teenage mermaid she wants legs. It's your job to get all of the right ingredients and Mia's job to reap the rewards. That sounds fair enough. Make the right choices, sit back and watch as Mia gets her wonderful human legs...or destroy the whole town.

name: Mega Man Battle Network 3 White
summary:
Using an RPG style, you must guide Mega Man through various levels defeating enemies along the way and collecting the various chips to upgrade Mega Man's weapons and other items.

Exclusive to this, the White Version, are specialy developed chips (Giga Class chips) that only the White Version of Mega Man can use. You can also trade various chips between players using either Blue or White versions of BN3. Other differences include exclusive enemy bosses in areas and a unique battle style for each games version that Mega Man can use.

name: Memorion
summary: Memorion is a puzzle game in which you need to turn on all the orbs. Each orb you turn on changes the state of the adjacent orbs. Will you have the courage and the wits to turn on all the orbs and recover your memories? The answers lie within the depths of your own mind.

name: Men in Black: Global Invasion
summary: Step into the shoes of a Men In Black agent in the official mobile game of the Men In Black franchise! Alien criminals are invading every corner of the planet are now threatening the safety of humankind. Utilizing the latest location-based AR technology, it is up to you to find and capture these aliens before it is too late!

name: Men of War: Assault Squad 2 - Airborne
summary: Men of War: Assault Squad 2 - Airborne is the second DLC for AS2. It comes with a set of new features and additional singleplayer content. Fight as airborne commander behind enemy lines and support allied landing operations. The success of these operations will depend solely on you!

name: Mech Farmer
summary: A farming-combat RPG set on an alien world - with a space-western vibe. Supply the colonists with crops, help them with personal issues and defend them from hostile alien monstrosities. Full day/night seasonal cycle and fast-paced combat awaits!

name: Medieval Life
summary: 'Medieval Life,' an immersive open-world RPG. Experience the Middle Ages like never before with realistic game mechanics, dynamic character development, and a narrative shaped by your choices. Explore, strategize, and forge your legacy in a historically rich, living medieval world.

name: MelodyJourney
summary: A light and casual music game with multiple nested modes. In game, players take on the role of a slime with an unknown background, collecting energy through rhythm-based gameplay to power up a spaceship and uncover its story.

name: MegaRats
summary:
The planet is under attack by Giant Rats.  We don't know where they came from, or why they're here.  Help the citizens of Mega Rats defend their cities.

Mega Rats is a fun filled and carefully crafted mix of fluid physical motion and hilarious Giant Rats. 

Mixing gameplay aspects of a First Person Shooter with a 3rd Person action adventure game, Mega Rats provides hours of fun. 
Explore the landscapes, discover cities, and defend the citizens, with full rigid body character physics in a large open world. 
Enjoy smooth character control while immersing yourself in the visceral soundtrack accompanying Mega Rats.   
Mega Rats can be played in VR!Virtual Reality requires a supported Head Mounted Display (OSVR or SteamVR Compatible), but Mega Rats can also be played on 3D Televisions and regular 2D monitors.

name: Mech Arena: Robot Showdown
summary: Mech Arena is a competitive multiplayer mobile mech shooter with team-based gameplay, intense battles, and a lot of ways to show off your skills.

name: Meteos: Disney Magic
summary: The follow-up to one of the most critically-acclaimed Nintendo DS games to date, Meteos: Disney Magic combines the superb puzzle gameplay of the original version with beloved Disney brands. Featuring an original story within the classic Disney universe, players will be asked to help Jiminy Cricket and Tinker Bell in their quest to re-organize the famous Disney storybook vault after someone accidentally changed the stories.

name: Memory of The Waters
summary: Duke is lost in a snowy wilderness (probably because of alcohol). He stumbles heroicly around and discovers all sorts of eerie locations.

name: Me & My Pets 3D
summary: All your favorite pets are happily waiting for you!

name: Mega Man X3
summary: The PlayStation/Sega Saturn port of Mega Man X3 adds a new soundtrack in CD-quality and cutscenes in FMV.

name: Metropolis Crimes
summary: Metropolis Crimes is a gripping adventure game where players assume the role of detective Red Johnson in the corrupt city of Metropolis. Investigate crime scenes, analyze clues through puzzles, and interrogate witnesses to solve four intriguing cases. Uncover the truth behind each scenario and experience the thrilling world of crime in Metropolis.

name: Merge Friends
summary: Merge Friends is an addicting merge game, where players merge, trade, and help to rebuild an almost-forgotten community.

name: Metal Rampage Uprising
summary: Metal Rampage: Uprising is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Plunge into the exciting world of the future, where humanity is in danger from an army of destructive robots. You, in the role of a highly effective combat robot, have become humanity's last hope for salvation.

name: Medal of Honor: Frontline HD
summary:
Medal of Honor: Frontline for PlayStation 3 is a high-definition remaster of the classic shooter game by Dreamworks Interactive.

The Nazi invasion is in full swing, and you're the Lieutenant who's going to put a stop to it. Step into the shoes of Lt. Jimmy Patterson once again, sweeping across Europe to rescue the innocent and destroy the opposition. The 15 assignments range from saving captured OSS operatives from a Nazi-held Dutch manor house to dismantling a German naval base. Of course, all the action takes place in detailed 3D; featuring some of the more amazing graphics you'll ever lay eyes on. Your job is a little too tough for any one man to pull off on his own, so you'll have a loyal group of soldiers and a slew of weaponry including the Liberator Pistol, Panzerschreck, MG42, and B.A.R. all of which will come to your aid in the heat of battle. Divided into five main missions, the gameplay is extensive and meticulously constructed, resulting in an experience that trumps earlier series instalments.

name: Meria and the Island of Orcs
summary: A flock of orcs suddenly appeared in a peaceful country town, and harmed the villagers. A novice sorcerer "Meria" accept to hunt the orcs from the mayor and face them in order to save the town.

name: Meteor Genocide
summary: Our only goal in this 2D space game is to reach the highest score by avoiding the meteor obstacles on our way.

name: Metro Simulator 2
summary: Metro Simulator 2 is a unique game featuring recreated Moscow Metro and realistic train controls.

name: Mercforce: 30X1
summary: The Mercforce needs you! Fight back against the AI menace across a series of exhilarating missions with your friends in this cooperative third person space shooter!

name: Meu Primeiro Laptop da Xuxa
summary:
A handheld LCD educational game console that imitates the aspect of a laptop computer. It was endorsed by the Brazilian celebrity Xuxa.

Due to its low-end hardware, "Laptop da Xuxa" and "PC da Xuxa" became popular slangs for any weak computer in Brazil.

name: Medusa's Mini Mystery
summary: Help a Medusas hair snakes find out who ate her donut before she wakes up and they all get in trouble!

name: MechCommander 2
summary: MechCommander Gold is the 1999 update to FASA Interactive's MechCommander, which contains both the original title's campaign and an entirely new 12-mission scenario called Desperate Measures, which incorporates several new 'Mech, weapons, and vehicles.

name: Mecha Nun-chuck Redeemer
summary: Wield this Mighty Holy Weapon to Smite waves of mecha-demons ! Fill the Special Attack Gauge to launch a Devastating Holy Hand Grenade Attack! This Awesome Divine Power is Yours for a small donation of course.

name: Melia Keys In... Quantum Decade
summary: It's hard being a weeb in your 20's... especially when an alien fangirl from space mistakes you for her favorite character!

name: Melodia
summary: Melodia is a Yume Nikki fangame. As the title suggests, has a major musical motif. The objective is to collect Melodies throughout the dream world, accessed through falling asleep in front of the TV. Collecting Melodies causes more doors to appear at the Nexus.

name: Mega Man: Rock N Roll
summary: A mysterious robot force is invading the city and abducting Robot Masters. Proto Man and Mega Man both succumb to the terror leaving Roll alone and scared. Back at Dr. Light's lab Roll decides to go through the procedure her brother did to become a super fighting robot.

name: Merchant 64
summary: Merchant 64 a tiny retro inspired traveling merchant game! Take control of Merchant as you buy goods at low prices and sell them in different towns at higher prices.

name: Memory Card Monsters: Expanded Content 5
summary: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Mental Asylum VR
summary: Immersive horror experience. Try to get out of it alive.

name: Metal Gear Solid Touch
summary:
Metal Gear Solid Touch is a third-person shooter video game for iOS based on Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots.

The player navigates through several missions based on stages from Metal Gear Solid 4, each introduced by brief text summarizing the story so far. The player moves their finger across the screen to aim, tapping to fire, and moving their fingers together or apart to zoom in or out with a sniper rifle, removing their fingers from the screen to get behind cover and avoid enemy fire. The main character's primary weapons, an assault rifle and a sniper rifle, can be rotated with one another by pinching the device's screen.

The player plays as Solid Snake, who is also known as Old Snake in Metal Gear Solid 4. The entirety of Metal Gear Solid has been streamlined into a portable and more accessible form. The main objective of most missions is to kill a set number of enemies. Enemies include hostile PMC soldiers, Haven Troopers and Gekkos, which are unmanned fighting machinations. There are also friendly targets which the player is penalised for shooting at. Some sections contain 'Boss fights', where the player fights a boss from the Metal Gear Solid 4 storyline; e.g. Laughing Octopus. At the end of each mission, the player is awarded a rank based on their precision and speed in completing the mission. Higher ranks award more Drebin Points, which can be used to buy rewards such as iPhone character wallpapers.

name: Memories Unveiled
summary: During this emotional journey, the player will be faced with choices that will affect a father's story and relationship. These choices can bring healing, help Michael find comfort in his memories, or increase his distress by getting lost in nostalgia.

name: Men in Black: The Series - Crashdown
summary: Men in Black: The Series - Crashdown is a first-person shooter video game based on the animated television series, Men in Black: The Series. The game was developed by Runecraft and published by Infogrames for the PlayStation. The game was released in November 2001, and received mixed and average reviews.

name: Metroid: Eternal
summary:
A 2020 April Fools "update" to the critically acclaimed fangame 'AM2R: Return of Samus'.

After exterminating the Metroids, Metroid: Eternal follows Samus as she returns to SR-388 to eliminate the Septogg threat as well, on the Galactic Federation's orders. This title is played from an old-school arcade perspective, with quick reflexes, item collection and strategic reloading being the main focus of the game.

name: Memories From Beyond a Coral Sea
summary: Explore your way through mystical islands while learning about your characters past. In this short adventure game you play as the protagonist of a memoire, telling a story from the pacific in the late 1800 century.

name: Me and My Dogs: Friends Forever
summary: Dream of having your own cute dog? Thanks to Me and My Dogs: Friends Forever, you can have up to three of the cutest pups imaginable and take them with you everywhere you go!

name: Medieval Kingdom Wars: Royal Blood
summary: Only those of Royal Blood can undertake the King’s Campaign. Defend your mighty nation from enemies near and far, build your towns and cities into imgrenable bastions and economic powerhouses, and expand your realm by claiming all that is yours by right of your royal blood.

name: Memoir
summary: A short memoir that recounts the memories of him first love

name: Melting pot.
summary: The hero advances the story of love by selecting one from among three men (prince, singer, devil). Fate will change greatly depending on your choice.

name: MechWarrior 3: Pirate's Moon
summary: Mechwarrior 3: Pirate's Moon was an expansion pack for the popular third instalment of the mechwarrior franchise. It included new 'Mechs and new missions.

name: Megamind: The Blue Defender
summary: Just as Megamind has become our new Mega Hero, a sudden crime wave hits the city. The Doom Syndicate & their Doom Goons have emerged and are looking to take over! Only Megamind and his arsenal of gadgets can stop them!

name: Medarot 7: Kuwagata Version
summary:
Medarot 7 is the seventh numbered game in the Medarot franchise.

Much like its predecessor Medarot DS, Medarot 7 is an RPG following the adventures of Azuma Amakura and his Medarot Metabee (in the Kabuto version) or Rokusho (in the Kuwagata version). Medarot 7 incorporates many of the gameplay changes made in Medarot DS, but does not function as a sequel. Rather, it completely ignores the events of Medarot DS and begins a new story using the same characters and places.

name: Metal Dragon/Life on Mars
summary: Kai Magazine Software brings two action-packed 16-bit titles to Evercade. Battle to prevent World War III in Metal Dragon, and solve the mystery of a seemingly abandoned space colony in Life on Mars!

name: Medo do Escuro
summary: In Medo do Escuro (Fear of the Dark), you follow Bianca, a 6-year-old girl who needs to explore a haunted house on a journey to rescue her stuffed bunny named Apep.

name: Medarot 5: Susutake-mura no Tenkousei - Kuwagata Version
Memorial Playground
summary: Memorial Playground is an English fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as August and explore his dreams. These dreams contains elements related to his past.

name: Merge
summary: Merge is a 2~4 players shooter party game, which can also play single player with computer. Each player plays as a mystery creature called "I", which is weak, helpless but greedy and fierce. It can parasitize and control every weapon or defense component it attaches.

name: Megadon
summary: A shooter from Photar.

name: Medal of Honor: Airborne
summary: Originally announced as a cross-generational title that would have two versions - a full-fledged HD version on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, and PC platforms, and a second, scaled back version developed for the less powerful hardware of the Wii, PlayStation 2, and original Xbox. The scaled back version was cancelled for all three platforms, Wii included.

name: Metal Breaker
summary: A fast-paced, adult side scrolling shooter inspired by classic shoot-em-up games.

name: Memory Lane
summary:
This game is a story-based textadventure where you can explore the town and discover mysterious places. Collect multiple items and interact with other citizens. There's just one hook... they no longer seem to remember you.

You can reach up to 6 different endings depending on your actions!

name: MegaMu
summary: MEGAMU aims to offer the best gaming experience, capable of avoiding repetitive tasks while maintaining challenges and objectives even for advanced players. The server has settings that adapt to the player's progress and also provide goals to be achieved.

name: Merry Christmas: Snowball Bubble
summary: Enjoy the classic bubble game, where you can now discover the figures hidden in each of the snowballs.

name: Mes Comptines
summary: Mes Comptines combines 17 all time favorite children songs in newly composed versions together with lively adorable 3D animations.

name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater - Slipcase Edition
summary: This version of MGS3 came in a special cardboard sleeve, exclusive to HMV stores. The sleeve was also available at a signing event, hand signed by Hideo Kojima and Yoji Shinkawa.

name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty - Limited Edition
summary: A really rare collector’s item from the Metal Gear Solid universe. The Sons of Liberty Metal Tin was available in a very limited quantity. Contents: Metal Tin, Standard edition game, Bonus DVD.

name: Mega Man X: Generation
summary: This hack for Mega Man X changes all the levels and graphics from the original into a whole new layout. The background music are also changed.

name: Metal Sonic in Sonic 3 & Knuckles
summary:
Metal Sonic in Sonic 3 & Knuckles replaces Sonic with Metal Sonic from Sonic CD, you can no longer choose from the numerous playstyles but Metal has his own abilities such as use of the elemental sheilds and a boost.

Metal Sonic must save Angel Island and take down his Mechanical Doppleganger.

name: Melobeat
summary: You can be a pianist with Melobeat!

name: Medal of Honor: Limited Edition
summary:
Limited Edition instantly unlock an exclusive multiplayer weapon and get early access to two high-powered shotguns. Plus, be one of the first to play the highly anticipated Battlefield 3!

Exclusive to the PS3 version is the digitally remastered version of Medal of Honor Frontline in HD.

name: Merlin's Chess
summary: Merlin's Chess is a fantasy-themed VR chess game brings a completely new gameplay experience to the greatest strategy game ever. Explore an immersive and enchanting way to play chess.

name: Men in Black II: Alien Escape
summary: Men in Black 2: Alien Escape is a fast-paced third-person perspective action game liberally infused with the trademark humor of the smash 1997 movie and the upcoming sequel. The game is divided into five distinct episodes, including a Nuclear Station, the Docks and the streets of Manhattan. All episodes include numerous levels and challenges to complete prior to progressing through the game.

name: Medieval Cop: Wolf's Bane
summary:
Wolf's Bane is a special episode focused around Ada Graceheart.

It's a spin-off of the serie Medieval Cop.

name: MechWarrior 3050
summary: The game is viewed in an isometric view and features a unique 2 player mode where one player controls the bottom half of the mech to navigate it around the map while the second player controls the upper torso which moves independently.

name: Medieval Fantasy: Jigsaw Puzzle - Funny Moments
Melopad
summary:
The awesome Music Game!

1. Be a pianist!!
You can be a pianist with Melopad!!
More than 30 songs would be added every month!!

2. MP3 Rhythm Game
Play Melopad with your own MP3 files.
MELOBEAT can play any song on your device.
DRM-protected files would not be supported.

name: Metal Gear Solid 4 Database
summary:
Metal Gear Solid Database is an encyclopedia of the entire saga and catalogs every piece of Metal Gear in-game lore from all canonical entries in the series at the time of its release: Metal Gear, Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake, Metal Gear Solid, Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty, Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, Metal Gear Solid: Portable Ops, and Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots.

Data and files for Metal Gear Solid 4 are only unlocked after completion.

name: Mermaid Melody: Pichi Pichi Pitch - Pichi Pichitto Live Start!
summary: Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch Pichitto Live Start! is a licensed game developed by Konami and published for the Game Boy Advance platform. It takes inspiration from the Dance Dance Revolution series, using music and characters from the anime of the same name. It includes all the songs from the first Mermaid Melody GBA game and adds more from the second half of the TV series.

name: Men in Black: Alien Assault
summary:
Men in Black: Alien Assault is a top down action game for mobile phones based on the movie by Columbia Pictures Industries.

Aliens are living on Earth, right among the human population. Nobody knows but a super-secret organization called MIB. As some of the aliens are going crazy, the player slips into the role of Agent Jay, whose mission is to protect humans and to stop the alien rage. in order to do so, Agent Jay uses different weapons and the famous neuralizer.

name: Memorial Pillage
summary: Venture into the cave...

name: Medved Hellraiser 2
summary: Continuation of the carbon monoxide trash shooter. The player has to go through all the levels, burning enemies with a fire ax, and shooting them with a shotgun and grenade launcher musket.

name: Medieval Mayor
summary: Medieval Mayor is a city-building game set in the middle ages.

name: Mental Math Tutor
summary: Mental Math Tutor is a fun flash card game for learning, become the KING of PE(MD)(AS) and show your math teachers who's boss!

name: Metal Slug: Attack
summary: SNK Playmore follows up their insanely successful Metal Slug Defense with this 20th Anniversary celebration title.

name: Mega Man 2
summary: Based on the NES game Mega Man 2. It was released in 1988.

name: Meteorfall: Journey
summary:
Meteorfall is a deck-building roguelike. You'll choose your class from one of four unique adventurers, and then set out with a deck consisting of some basic attack cards. During the course of your adventure, you'll be presented with the opportunity to add powerful new cards to your deck.
